name: Gramin
reviews_list:
[('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  A very homely place. Best thing about this place is selection of music. The next best thing being its theme which takes you away from all the Mexican, Italian food and cafes and Pubs. Its gives you so much desi feel in the same streets of Koramangala which is one of the best partying place of Bangalore. Food is good, staff is polite and seating arrangement is just awesome. A must try place. Also a place where one can go for getting some desi feels.'), ('Rated 5.0', "RATED
  Being a hard core non vegetarian, I was not sure about this place.
But going to this place was really a superb decision, loved the ambience , food, service, quality and quantity of food.

We ordered
2 soups - corn & mix veg
1 - some sort of paneer tikka with a filling
Dal & a gravy

All the dishes we had were superb.
I'm definitely taking my vegetarian friends to this place again."), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  One of the restaurants in this locality which serves best vegetarian food. The ambience is in sync with the name of the place.

The food was good. We tried stuffed Tandoori Aloo, Gulkhand milkshake, Thali lunch and a Pineapple Pulao. Loved all the dishes except for the Pulao.

A really good place for veg food.'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  The ambiance of the place is quite nice with old Bollywood music playing in the background. The staffs were courteous. We had ordered Butter Naan, Paneer Darbarbi, Paneer Butter Masala, Masala Papad and Lassi. The Paneer butter masala was really delicious and Paneer Darbarbi was quite spicy. Overall, the food was really good.'), ('Rated 5.0', "RATED
  Pocket friendly, soul north Indian veg food. Delicious. Usually we have to wait as the crowd is always good here and why not coz they serve authentic North cuisine. I had been here many times and never was I ever dissatisfied with the food and their hospitality. Service is slow coz of lots of orders coming in bunch but the taste, the ambiance and hospitality compensates that. Staff are polite and friendly and they'll greet you with the Indian traditional ''Namaskar'' when you enter through the main door. The ambiance is beautiful with the paintings on wall reminds of old retro dhaba style with old melodies song playing - a true Gramin experience in city. We ordered chilly babycorn in starters, butter naan and butter kulcha, paneer tikka masala and boondi raita. Loved it."), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  This mezzanine restaurant is a good option for all those strict vegetarians out there. The theme of the restaurant is that of an artistic village with the wall decorations, the motifs and the festoons, and some copper cutlery(should have been brass no?!)thrown in. I drank my first thandai here and I loved its sweetness underlined by some gingery pungency. Lahsooni paneer dhuadar was dhuadar yes! For it came covered in a copper vessel with smoking charcoal embers sitting right at the centre. We ordered the very simple bhindi anardana and baingan bharta, of them both I didn't find anything worthy of a complaint. Ghee rotis were good. As far as the pricing goes, one can safely say that it is a mid-range restaurant. Service standards are good."), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  It's a great place for vegetarian food! Located inside Raheja Arcade in Koramangala, this place serves homely veg thalis and other times at an affordable rate. The Kulchas are good. The Service is quick and nice here!
Must visit :))"), ('Rated 3.0', "RATED
  The tasty is good but not really worth the price.
It is too over priced.
The ambience is amazing really authentic but the PRICE!!
SERVICE IS NICE AND QUICK !
Must try once if you're in Bangalore near koramanglaa!"), ('Rated 3.0', "RATED
  Me with few of my friends visited this place yesterday. We tried few varieties of food. Starters were tasty, tandai was too good, pulka was ok ( have had better pulka's at gramin before), curries were ok as well. Ambience can be made much better or atleast seating needs to be changed. Service was good as always.

Taste buds : 3.5/5
Ambience : 3/5
Pocket Friendly : 3/5
Service : 4/5
Overall : 3.5/5"), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  Gramin! Definitely one of the best places for veg food. Not the biggest fan of having veg, but still I'd recommend this. Ambience is great! Feels quite upbeat! Plain Bollywood songs in the background. Inside rahega arcade on first floor, try the recommendations."), ('Rated 5.0', "RATED
  Have been to this place twice and it has never disappointed me. The gravies, the starters, the breads, the drinks, everything is just perfect. Malai kofta was yum and is a must try. Also, you shouldn't miss aam panna if it's the season."), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  Best vegetarian hotel in town. The most awesome service I have seen ever. Friendly staff. Food z too good and drinks are OMG jus yummy. We love it.'), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  And a 5 star for their beautiful ambience which feels alot like being in a gramin. Well i tried Jain Biryani,Dal makhani and Paneer Malai kofta. Biryani here is awesome . Nothing like anything.
Do visit them guys.'), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  Have been visiting this place for close to 10 years now. So happy to know and let other food connoisseur know that in terms of taste it has just remained at the top and what has improved is their service and staff attitude. I always keep going back here whenever I crave for authentic North Indian food and never have I ever been disappointed. The quality and quantity of the food is really awesome and the fact that it is still so economical is such a great thing. The only drawback is the fact that getting a parking spot is a real pain. Other than that it is always a delightful experience. I will certainly recommend this place to everyone.'), ('Rated 5.0', "RATED
  This place is a delight for all vegetarian folks in Bangalore. It's popular and there's always a queue to get in. Love the boondi raita and masala buttermilk here. Need to visit again soon ?"), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  Went here for dinner. We had lasuni paneer for starter and handi biryani. The paneer was amazing and was served with green chutney.
The handi biryani tasted good. Also i had masala buttermilk which was very refreshing and very very tasty. I highly recommend to taste the masala buttermilk.
The ambience is very appealing as well. Over all it is a good place for good vegetarian food.'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  Location of Gramin is pretty good, right opposite Koramangala Forum. It's a good local restaurant to try with tranditonal decor. Gramin means "the village". So it aims to serve local tastes without artifical flavoring. The food is a bit spicy for me. But it's a money worth.
They have vegan option and diet option, which is quite friendly! ??'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  Want to have great indian food with authentic taste
Head out to gramin, located at the ground floor of raheja arcade.
It has great indian interior and the service is amazing too.

Must try their lassi and buttermilk. Also try their dal makahanis

Thalis also fill you up and have great quantity.

Delight for vegetarians.'), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  Have been visiting this place for close to 10 years now. So happy to know and let other food connoisseur know that in terms of taste it has just remained at the top and what has improved is their service and staff attitude. I always keep going back here whenever I crave for authentic North Indian food and never have I ever been disappointed. The quality and quantity of the food is really awesome and the fact that it is still so economical is such a great thing. The only drawback is the fact that getting a parking spot is a real pain. Other than that it is always a delightful experience. I will certainly recommend this place to everyone.'), ('Rated 5.0', "RATED
  This place is a delight for all vegetarian folks in Bangalore. It's popular and there's always a queue to get in. Love the boondi raita and masala buttermilk here. Need to visit again soon ?"), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  Went here for dinner. We had lasuni paneer for starter and handi biryani. The paneer was amazing and was served with green chutney.
The handi biryani tasted good. Also i had masala buttermilk which was very refreshing and very very tasty. I highly recommend to taste the masala buttermilk.
The ambience is very appealing as well. Over all it is a good place for good vegetarian food.'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  Location of Gramin is pretty good, right opposite Koramangala Forum. It's a good local restaurant to try with tranditonal decor. Gramin means "the village". So it aims to serve local tastes without artifical flavoring. The food is a bit spicy for me. But it's a money worth.
They have vegan option and diet option, which is quite friendly! ??'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED

  Food Paradise for all my vegetarian friends.
You must try their dal Afghani, Mirchi paranthe, veg pulao.
There is always a queue outside. So you can well understand that this is a real popular place.'), ('Rated 3.0', 'RATED
  A good place to have Indian authentic food. Upper deck seating is not that great tho. Dates milkshakes, buttermilk and jaljeera are must try.'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  Gramin has a nice ambience. And they have low oil,low spice food. Pricing is real cheap and if you want home cooked north indian food,then this place will not disappoint.'), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  Good option for Veg Food!!
The Restaurant is very small and can accomodate very less people.

  Great place but isn't much impressive compared to the other vegetarian restaurants in the vicinity.

There is no proper parking space owned by the restaurant which would make you opt for the paid parking area behind the restaurant.

Kudos to the ambience of the place, gives you a fresh, authentic Village wali feeling. Friendly staff, and attractive menu.

Coming to the food, we ordered Paneer kurkure (nothing to brag about), a bread basket and went for a Deshi Sabji side dish (as suggested by the waiter when we asked for a non spicy dish). The side dish was very spicy and the Roti's/parathas/kulchas were just ok. Handi Biryani with mix raitha was worth mentioning. It had the right taste. Lassi/milkshakes/buttermilk was good.

Very well priced and easy on the pocket.

There is a room for improvement at this restaurant as it is located at the center of koramangala and Veggies would love to be there.

Keep rocking!"), ('Rated 3.0', "RATED
  Why we went there: Very good vegetarian restaurant
What we liked: Food quality
What could be better: I've been there twice and both times I did not feel the service to be as good as the food. The staff were very reluctant to even come to the table to take order.
Platter winner: Chilli baby corn starter, Gramin kofta.
Word of caution: I personally felt the food to be little spicy.

Food is worth 4/5. Giving 3 for the service."), ('Rated 3.0', "RATED
  Bakasura didn't find it amusing! The taste was average the ambience was average. Thali with phulka, was average. Nothing great. Overall its a one timer.

bakasuraforever.in"), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  This place is houseful everyday, you heard it right everyday. Food here is amazing and service is super quick like they make up for the waiting time. Recommended is Bhindhi Rajasthani and you will go back for this.'), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  Loved the ambience and the food. Visited this place for team lunch. Opted for the veg thali. We were served tandoori roti, dal, paneer, aloo dum,salad,gulab jamun, raita and pulao. Loved the food and quantity was great. Had a filling lunch. Looking forward to visiting again soon.'), ('Rated 3.0', "RATED
  Great place but isn't much impressive compared to the other vegetarian restaurants in the vicinity.

There is no proper parking space owned by the restaurant which would make you opt for the paid parking area behind the restaurant.

Kudos to the ambience of the place, gives you a fresh, authentic Village wali feeling. Friendly staff, and attractive menu.

Coming to the food, we ordered Paneer kurkure (nothing to brag about), a bread basket and went for a Deshi Sabji side dish (as suggested by the waiter when we asked for a non spicy dish). The side dish was very spicy and the Roti's/parathas/kulchas were just ok. Handi Biryani with mix raitha was worth mentioning. It had the right taste. Lassi/milkshakes/buttermilk was good.

Very well priced and easy on the pocket.

There is a room for improvement at this restaurant as it is located at the center of koramangala and Veggies would love to be there.

Keep rocking!"), ('Rated 3.0', "RATED
  Why we went there: Very good vegetarian restaurant
What we liked: Food quality
What could be better: I've been there twice and both times I did not feel the service to be as good as the food. The staff were very reluctant to even come to the table to take order.
Platter winner: Chilli baby corn starter, Gramin kofta.
Word of caution: I personally felt the food to be little spicy.

Food is worth 4/5. Giving 3 for the service."), ('Rated 3.0', "RATED
  Bakasura didn't find it amusing! The taste was average the ambience was average. Thali with phulka, was average. Nothing great. Overall its a one timer.

name: Delhi Home Food
reviews_list: [('Rated 5.0', 'RATED\n  Very tasty food, I liked thali. North Indian thali was very tasty and was reasonable. Thali had 3 rotis, jeera rice,dal,curd,allo jeera dry and rajma.')]

name: Kwality Wall's Swirl's Happiness Station
reviews_list:
[('Rated 1.0', "RATED
  They have various Cornetto cones priced at 30,40,45,55,65...etc...but there's only one option to take the Cornetto cones, why is this so? If ur not placing the things u wanna sell properly, what's the point of putting up the menu? Make sure theres a section of Cornetto cones with its price variations"), ('Rated 2.0', 'RATED
  not up to the mark, by the time it arrived was melted'), ('Rated 1.0', "RATED
  I haven't received the order."), ('Rated 2.0', "RATED
  The service and the ambience was good. But their softie cone (soft serve) was like made with water and flavoring. Cheapest quality ice cream I ever tasted. I don't know if it was the softie machine's fault or of their ice cream brand. I personally like burger king's softie and it is way cheaper(18rs or something)."), ('Rated 2.0', 'RATED
  The first time i visited Kwality Walls, i straight away wanted to try something new and that was  Chill Grill (choose your flavors and the ice cream in beaten up on ice sheet marble and served in a cup) I chose 'Tutti Fruti  and Fruit & Nut", which were creamilicious. Sometime later, I ordered the same two and they did not taste anything like before. Their Swirls are not my favorite, McD has better ones!
 
The poor rating goes to the way the place is handled. Firstly, the place is always empty . Secondly the staff is rude, moody and unprofessional, sometimes unhygienic too. Third, the TV is always on and the staff are the only ones who watch it. They are least bothered about customers. It's located in such a prime area and they have such good space, but i feel its being wasted. Why is the management so ignorant and not doing anything about it; despite poor rating for all 3 outlets.'), ('Rated 2.0', 'RATED
  Stinking horrible place.. Can hardly see anyone there.. On my first visit I ordered and was waiting for delivery, for which it never received the product. Questioned him and repeated the order again yet never received, just waste of time waiting there... My wife had been there with our kid, lucky she got the order ice cream and landed with stomach upset..'), ('Rated 4.5', 'RATED
  nice place to hang out with friends ... always liked this place ... and the ice cream is really good and tasty on par with the likes of baskin robbins and swensens from our domestic company ..... they maintain good hygiene and quality'), ('Rated 1.5', 'RATED
  This was my 1st visit to this branch, terrible experience from the guy who prepares. Firstly he is not familiar with Kannada or English. So communication issues. Next, we ordered Cornetto Fresh fruit, he gave it very quickly. But it had nothing but only some ice cream and very few pomegranates. According to the menu, it says Swirl, Strawberry and Choco biscuits in the tip. But this guy never replied for watever we asked which was not there in the swirl. Fresh fruit swril is famous for Strawberry, which is not a seasonal fruit, its available all time. Very bad. Never expected this kinda service. #kwalitywalls address this please.'), ('Rated 3.5', "RATED
  People have mixed feelings about this place. As per me, Kwality Walls is still a best along with other Ice Cream Brands. I had my first Choco Bar from Kwality Walls only. Well, The Kwality Wall's Swirls in BSK look like a flagship outlet with pretty decent interiors. I love their Strawberry, Butterscotch & Kesar Pista at any point of time. They have umbrella chairs & bean bags outside & inside. They should probably work on pricing part, since the prices are too expensive. I recommend this place!

bangaloreepicure.com"), ('Rated 2.5', "RATED
  This place is located in a corner, off Banashankari BDA complex. Nice little place, with a pleasing ambience (with tables under an umbrella on the outside). They provide quick service too.

Now coming to the ice creams themselves, they're quite disappointing. They do not even compare to other popular parlours like Corner House or Baskin Robbins. The prices though, still remain 'premium', as always.

Not really worth visiting.

Food - 1/5
Ambiance - 3/5
Service - 4/5
Value for money - 1.5/5
Hygiene - 3/5
Overall - 2.5/5"), ('Rated 4.5', 'RATED
  Had the best Kesar pista ice cream. Never expected this quality from Kwality walls. Heard the swirls to be their signature to be my next cone to dive in.'), ('Rated 2.5', 'RATED
  A good place to hang out and spend sometime but the ice creams does not compliment.. Nothing admirable in the likes of great chains of ice cream parlours in Bangalore..'), ('Rated 1.5', 'RATED
  More "ice" than "cream".
The problem with Kwality Walls is that firstly, it doesn't even contain the minimum quantity of milk to be called ice cream and it is rather slyly labeled as a " frozen dessert ".
Nowhere on the carton do they mention the words " ice cream". It mainly consists of hydrogenated vegetable oil, water and a small about of dehydrated milk.. Which is an utter disappointment.
I believe only in Naturals, Corner House and Baskin Robins do you get good quality ice cream that doesn't leave you bloated because of the hydrogenated oils.

I had ordered a chocolate milkshake which tasted watered down and not at all worth the money they charged.

Service was fine. Ambience is good, too. Hence the extra 0.5 stars. Although, I am extremely disappointed with the quality of their food.'), ('Rated 3.0', 'RATED
  Nice serve

But there is no different varieties were u can choose the good
I had some problem wit the menu
Dnt get the best of it


change the menu nd start trying new things


I think the menu 2 years ago was the best')]

name: The Food Dude
reviews_list:
[('Rated 5.0', "RATED
  I rate this joint 4.5, here's why:

It's good to see options for late night deliveries when you are working late and end up going home to an empty kitchen.  More importantly, the quality of food was impeccable and it was rather hot when it arrived, considering namma traffic!  

The Thai Red Curry rice is a must try.  My personal favorite.  It was so rich, creamy and authentic in taste.  I even saved some for lunch the following day.  I also tried their Paprika Pasta.  I love Paprika.  This pasta was well made and really good in taste.  If you see my previous write ups, very few places impress me with their pastas :-)

The Caesar salad was good and light, as it should be.  The vegetables used looked and tasted fresh.  The Chicken Caesar was for my friend who mentioned the meat was nice and juicy.

You have late night hunger pangs? you must order from these guys.  No disappointment!

foodloverspark.com")]

name: Andhra Ruchulu
reviews_list:
[('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  Online Order :

I keep ordering from Andra Ruchulu and they never fail to disappoint me. But this review is not about them or their service. I want to highlight their delicious chicken ghee roast biriyani which is a must try. Very unique combination of chicken ghee roast and biriyani is something which I had for the first time. I would highly recommend everyone to try this out.'), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  ????????? Food
????????? Value for Money
???‍???‍???‍???‍???‍???? Delivery

?Tried Boneless Kaju Chicken & Boneless Chicken 65 Biryani.

?Boneless Kaju Chicken - Crunchy deep fried batter coated chicken with cashews, curry leaves & spices. Amazing starter!!! Must try dish!!!
?Boneless Chicken 65 Biryani - Batter fried chicken pieces, sauteed with loads of onions, peppers, coriander & curry leaves in a spicy sauce, topped over a bed of perfectly cooked biryani rice. The rice & chicken was very tasty. Must try dish!!!

?Highly recommended!!!
?Must try!!!'), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  My 1st time here!
Opted for a delivery!
Ordered a chicken biryani and fish chilly.

Uluvacharu Chicken biryani was good. Filled with spices and tasted good. Quantity of chicken pieces was good too. Worth a try

Fish Chilly was tasty, was not aware that it was deep fried. More like a chicken kabab. Tasted well, the spice content was good. The only drawback - it was very salty! That's something which the restaurant can look into.

Taste - 4/5
Variety - 4/5
Quantity - 5/5
Price - 5/5
Packing - 4/5"), ('Rated 3.0', 'RATED
  Situated opposite road from kempfort mall.
Taste 4.5/5
Ambience 4/5
Price 3/5
Quantity 3/5
Vfm 3.5/5 ordered brinjal stuffed biryani , chicken Andhra style damn good taste , quantity was ok but seems bit pricey .. overall okay')]

name: Bombay Adda
reviews_list:
[('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  The place is very well decorated and very well lit. It gives a good vibe.

The staff is friendly.
The food is good.
The music is nice. It's like a good date place"), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  This place has it all- amazing ambience, delicious food and the right vibes.
Went here for lunch and had an amazing time!
The seating area is spread in three lavish areas and we opted for the ground floor. The care that has gone into the designing shows and instantly puts you in a good mood.
We started with few pani puri shots which were so much fun. Tried their lipsmacking butter garlic prawns and the idli platter. In mains had the nasi goreng and tried the raju ka omelette, both were really nice.
Special mention to the delicious chilli gauva panacotta as it was just the perfect dessert. So well balanced and smooth texture and yummy. Also had the blueberry cheesecake.
This is definitely my new favourite place.
Ambience 10/5
Service 5/5
Taste 5/5
Value for money 4.5/5'), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  Such a great place to have food. Light music, group parties, smoking zone available, They have the best menu with wide range of taste buds. Taka tak tapal tacos chicken is the best for some one to try with. Chicken biryani has the different aroma here.'), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  Bombay adda has something to offer to all kinds of people visiting it.

To begin with this humongous yet ambiant place has different kinds of seating options, sit out balcony, dance floor and bar counter.

The vast menu has been curated to give the best of cocktails, mocktails, starters, Italian, Chinese, Indian, desserts for all its visitors to enjoy there tastes and preferences.

Going by the suggestions I recieved to try, the idle platter was undoubtedly an amazing choice.

Must try: pav bhaji fondue and all the desserts

#rajeshwrites'), ('Rated 5.0', "RATED
  Beautiful and a lovely ambience. Loved the interiors of this place , it's done very well! We went there on a Saturday evening and the environment was more like that of a club. There was a very good DJ playing some great music. Since the place was overly crowded we couldn't eat much but did try their tandoori chicken pizza, veg biryani and fish fingers that tasted really good. Definitely going back to this place to have lunch on a peaceful afternoon."), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  Located at the most happening place in the city, Bombay Adda is knows for its vibrant ambience with good music and dance floor with both outdoor and indoor seatings. This place serves good food and menu has lot of options covering different cuisines. Slow seduction, Bom Bang Bom are their must try signature cocktails. Whole atmosphere is LIT during DJ night.'), ('Rated 5.0', "RATED
  One of the best LIT saturday night's happens in this place. The DJ is perfectly awesome he plays superb Bollywood. Food is made with perfection even after having huge crowd. But everything comes with a cost so is the drink at this place it's bit costly but then it's worth the night."), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED

  Bombay Adda is located on the same lane of Sapna book house, reliance foot prints. They are on the 5th floor of construction building.
Bombay Adda Tops on my current favourite list. Excellent Decor, spacious, luxury seating, awesome food, kickass cocktails and shooters, yummm desserts.
Am not a regular pani puri eater, btw pani puri over here is yumm.. Next is chilli cheese toast, it is so well made, I enjoyed every bite of it. We did order for veg pizza it's super thin but soft. Loaded with cheese and adds were jalapeÃ\x83Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x83Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82ÃÂ±os and tomatoe was super delicious. Pav bhajji was equally good.
Coming to Cocktails, they are mind-blowing they use the best brands and well made by there mixologist. Adda brew, BOM BANG Boom, Anna Ka Panna are my personal favorites, I did enjoy Rosemary Marlo from the Shooters.
Friendly Staff, Utham was a very friendly and then sanjay took over our table, he was also equally good.
#SpecialInfluencersTable"), ('Rated 5.0', "RATED

  Worst experiance so far.I have never seen any restaurant's manager or events team telling that if you book a table for 5 you will have to adjust in table for 4 ! Hilarious.

  It was Thursday night (weekday), I never expected such a huge crowd even on a week day..

  Bombay Adda was one of rocking experience i ever had. Bombay Adda is designed greatly to have blast. The place is spacious and has indoor and outdoor seating arrangements. The place has a very relaxing aura even after being lit adequately.

The food offered there has Indian twist to all it dishes. I ate pizza and burger. They both were surprisingly Indian and international at the same time.

kudos to the team for setting up this place in such a structured manner. You wouldn't be disappointed. Keep this place on top of your list if you plan to hangout in kormanagla."), ('Rated 3.0', "RATED
  I personally feel this place is overhyped, it has a good ambience, but the service should be improved a lot, I had to ask for water to 4 different waiters and finally I had to go myself to the bar counter to get it. I was very disappointed. The food options are very limited and vegetarian options are very few. I had ordered a Mac n Cheese, it was very very bland. I couldn't even finish the whole thing."), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  Went there for a office party, ambience was awesome and decor was well suited for Halloween party, the crowd was good and so as the Music, Dance floor, Food and drinks. Had a great time dancing the night off! Thanks :)'), ('Rated 5.0', "RATED
  Went on a Sunday for a drink with a friend and I was surprised to find it empty for a Sunday afternoon. But the place is really nice! The ambiance is super good, the staff were brilliant! We even got cake from a birthday celebration in the next table. Didn't really try much food. I wanted to eat something super spicy and they gave me exactly what I wanted. Next time I will definitely go there for lunch or dinner so I can try some of the food! The place is super spacious, lot of space to sit inside and outside (rooftop). Overall a 5/5!"), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED

  Yet another one on the wishlist ...visited on the first day of2019...loved the ambience...it's such a well made place...the cocktail options plenty and different too...well manicured food menu..great options in finger food as well as mains...some interesting fusion food options worth a try...tiramisu easily one of the best in town...neer dosa with mushroom sukka ..mouth watering stuff!   Wonderful ambiance which lights up your spirit. The service is fast and very courteous staff. The lighting is amazing at night with good music and food.'), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  The food is just way too good to be praised. We tried tandoori chicken and veggie pizza. The staff behaved very politely and the services were on time. The place has a great interior. The Christmas decor just enhanced this place even more. I surely suggest everyone else to check this place out'), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  I have to confess, anything with the name 'Bombay' in it, scores Brownie Points from me! I can't help it, it's my true love for this city.

Anyway, Bombay Adda has recently opened up in Bangalore, and I went here for lunch on a Sunday. Surprisingly, this place wasn't packed. It's a massive restaurant spread across two floors. There are gigantic chandeliers falling from the ceiling and apparently this place looks gorgeous at night.

The service was quite prompt. We ordered for a Chota Aam Panna, Chinese Bhel and Butter Chicken Bunny Chow. The portions were good. In fact, I was struggling to finish the main, as it was quite heavy.

They have an elaborate menu and I'll surely be heading back here soon!"), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  Bengaluru Bombay Adda is what it is called. So I visited this place on a Saturday night.There was a huge line at the entry so looked like this place is already made its name. I entered as easily as my name was on guest list . Thanks to the DJ.
This place is huge and the interiors are superb with outdior, indoor and a special lounge upstairs. You need a special access to go upstairs.

I tried nachos, fish fingers which tasted well. I mainly went for the drinks with my friends so we had LIIT , beer , wine.

Found the price to be little higher and the most of the beer were unavailable both the time I visited this place.

Overall i would this is a good party place to visit if you are ready to spend more money.

Happy Fooding!'), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  Wonderful ambiance which lights up your spirit. The service is fast and very courteous staff. The lighting is amazing at night with good music and food.'), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED

Quite okay....but for repeat order its very slow...
Drinks4/5

  A really cool place to eat and hangout. Just too crowded on weekends. They do take good care of their food and drinks.   First things first: Make sure you UPDATE the prices on Zomato. Ur drink prices are higher than what it reflects on Zomato.
Secondly, I found nothing wrong with the place and interiors, so 5 stars for that, however, the drink prices (Premium whiskey) are higher than standard pubs also, the Pizza was BLAAAH! U need to make sure at least the food is extraordinary when ur drink prices are lil higher.

  A really cool place to eat and hangout. Just too crowded on weekends. They do take good care of their food and drinks.   Totally loved the place . The staff is humble and co-operative and service is pretty good even during rush hours. Happy and nice vibes . The food and drinks are really good and at reasonable rates . Complete package for a great evening.'), ('Rated 3.0', 'RATED
  First things first: Make sure you UPDATE the prices on Zomato. Ur drink prices are higher than what it reflects on Zomato.
Secondly, I found nothing wrong with the place and interiors, so 5 stars for that, however, the drink prices (Premium whiskey) are higher than standard pubs also, the Pizza was BLAAAH! U need to make sure at least the food is extraordinary when ur drink prices are lil higher.
Also, there were cops that kept coming NOT just to check the decibel level of the music like u guys said, but also the Alcohol bottles. Quite concerning Bombay Adda.'), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  I had been to this place with my friend and I must say I was really happy.
Ambience is really good and they have seperate area for private parties as well.
Service is very good, we were served by a Staff called SANJAY who was very courteous.

And the best part is FOOD!! They have amazing food....there have pretty good options for vegetarians as well. Best place for instagrammers to click pics of food and ambience.

It's ideal to go out with bunch of people, since I felt quantity of food is bit more for only 2 people.

We had ordered below food:

Appetizers:
Mirchiwale Aloo with papad tacos : A fusion starter with was good.
Chinese Bhel: I loved this....it was spicy and perfect crisp.

Desserts :

Tiramisu: It had the perfect flavour of liquor and it was so light that it melted in mouth.totally loved it.
Belgian chocolate mousse: It was good.

There are many more dishes I have to try and I am sure I will visit this place couple of times.

Food : 4.5/5
Ambience: 5/5
Service: 5/5"), ('Rated 1.0', 'RATED
  An extremely hyped and mismanaged place. You should never visit this place on a weekend. The bartender made us run from one end of the bar to the other to place our drinks order. The cocktails were average and expensive for the cheap booze they were using. It was like a mad house .   We went there with a group of friends on a Friday night.
Felt the staff was not courteous and a bit rude as they were slow and did not care.
The starters and food is average but the chicken tikka is excellent.

We ordered pav bhaji fondue, hummosas, chicken tikka, Malai tikka, red sauce pasta & dal makhni & a few beers.

Everything other than the chicken tikkas and pasta was very ordinary and below par.

The vibe gets good and the DJ played some excellent songs.
A lot of the drinks on the menu were not available.

Ambience 4.5/5

Service 2/5
Vibe 4/5

So their cocktails are amazing. We ordered two cocktails which were really good. As they didn't have much of beer pints of our choice, so we had to settle down for cocktails. Food we ordered Raju ka omelette and Desi tandoori chicken pizza. Raju ka omelette is a good looking dish but bland. We didn't understand the dish at all. We had to waste though we are against wasting food. Pizza was the saviour, was really good.
Music was good and they have a huge dance floor. Perfect place for partying. Service was good. Prices are bit on the higher side."), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED

  Koramangala's latest addition, Bombay Adda was on my list for a very very long time after having heard a lot about the ambience and food.
Ambience - Really good, but we weren't allowed to be seated upstairs going at 2pm on a weekend. They never mentioned the reason.
Food - Chicken lollipop - bland.
Veg achaari paneer starter - bland again
Noodles with chicken and chicken Biryani were also not upto the mark.
Did not try their dessert since the food was a disappointment.
Wouldn't recommend for people who love spicy food."), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  Being attuned to KoramangalaÃ\x83Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x92s tightly packed joints, Bombay Adda was a welcome respite with its spacious interiors. Beautifully done up on the inside, the interiors are gram-worthy and the food, delectable.

We had the whiskey sour, a ginger ale, buttered garlic prawns and neer dosa. Aside from a slight eggy aftersmell on my whiskey sour (which is easily avoidable with the removal of the film coating the eggÃ\x83Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x92s shell) and the diced chicken in the neer dosa which seemed to have spent half its life in storage, everything else was delicious.

Had the Belgian cake for dessert and wasnÃ\x83Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x92t disappointed. I visited during brunch and there wasnÃ\x83Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x92t too much of a crowd, though the place seemed to be getting filled up as we exited. Will visit again!'), ('Rated 1.0', "RATED
  This is the worst restaurant I have ever been to.

Ambience 4 on 5
Taste 3 on 5
Service 0 on 5
Staff Behaviour 0 on 5

Imagine you go to a place where you find almost all tables full and 15 to 20 staff just moving everywhere and they don't know anything what's happening. No order on time. It took them 2 hours 20 mins to deliver 4 out of 7 things we ordered, 3 items they forgot.

Out of 4 which we received, 2 items had to be sent back as it was not properly done.

And you will find one guy who will just be going to every table asking whether this is your order and then dkeieve who ever claims it.

My suggestion to the Owner. Shut the place for 15 to 20 days. Train your staff and Chef properly then re launch or else you are surely going down soon.

Almost every guest was fighting with the manager.

Horrible experience"), ('Rated 3.0', "RATED

  Decided to visit the place after hearing a lot of buzz about it . . We visited the place on a Friday night. The ambience is very neatly done and I personally loved the quotes on the walls. The place was completely crowded and very lively. Food was above average and the cocktails were upto the mark. Presentation of the liquor bottles are innovative and eye catching.

All this being said, i really did not like the attitude of the staff when it came to the entry of the place. I understand every club has it's set of rules. We were neatly dressed group of 4 couples who had a reservation and agreed to do a good billing. In spite of this we were constantly being cross checked by the staff & managers about whether or not we had a reservation or we are stags etc . . Stop making your customers feel like trespassers. People will stop visiting if you don't treat your guests with warmth."), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  Bombay Adda
This place is situated at the right place of bangalore and covers two floors.
Bombay Adda is the first franchise outside Mumbai.
Nowadays we all love theme based cafes or restaurant to spend our quality time with best food..
Talking about ambience - it was amazing .. one of its sitting is indoor which will amaze you by its royalness.. and the another one is an open area as they offer outdoor seating (rooftop).
Walking by the two floors one can enjoy Mumbai Wala touch through graffiti wall
Overall great great ambience
Food- Ah.. presentation of food was amazing.. the part was... It is treat to the taste buds definitely.. it might be heavy for the pocket but it definitely worth it.. quality n quantity is too good

Additionally.. one can enjoy drinks .. night life.. dance n everything one want there..

Overall a great place to visit..
You must too..!!'), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  Amazing ambience, great location. Food is damn delicious. Went with friends, enjoyed a lot. Generous staff. Must visit place. One of best place in bangalore.'), ('Rated 2.0', 'RATED
  Visited for lunch ...ambience is very good Disapointed with the service . Each order placed after several reminders used to come after 45 mins to 1hr.. Even a bottle of beer placed cane after 2-3 reminders. On food we ordered, Mirchi masale aloo , nachos, Malai chicken Tikka , andha boorji was very bland , prawn curry rice was awesome . Pizza was very dry...Chinese bhel was good , paneer chilli was good.k on drinks the cocktails are very bad ...even a simple cosmopolitan cocktail was made badly , Sol seduction was horrible , long and sharp was very bad which was returned ..even after telling the cocktails were bad...
.'), ('Rated 3.0', 'RATED
  Good Ambience came here on a Sunday lovely place and food service is also presentable
Cheers to the team
Can do better to pull up the crowd with better music'), ('Rated 3.0', "RATED

  Visited for lunch ...ambience is very good Disapointed with the service . Each order placed after several reminders used to come after 45 mins to 1hr.. Even a bottle of beer placed cane after 2-3 reminders. On food we ordered, Mirchi masale aloo , nachos, Malai chicken Tikka , andha boorji was very bland , prawn curry rice was awesome . Pizza was very dry...Chinese bhel was good , paneer chilli was good.k on drinks the cocktails are very bad ...even a simple cosmopolitan cocktail was made badly , Sol seduction was horrible , long and sharp was very bad which was returned ..even after telling the cocktails were bad...
.'), ('Rated 3.0', 'RATED
  Good Ambience came here on a Sunday lovely place and food service is also presentable
Cheers to the team
Can do better to pull up the crowd with better music'), ('Rated 3.0', "RATED
  Decided to visit the place after hearing a lot of buzz about it . . We visited the place on a Friday night. The ambience is very neatly done and I personally loved the quotes on the walls. The place was completely crowded and very lively. Food was above average and the cocktails were upto the mark. Presentation of the liquor bottles are innovative and eye catching.

All this being said, i really did not like the attitude of the staff when it came to the entry of the place. I understand every club has it's set of rules. We were neatly dressed group of 4 couples who had a reservation and agreed to do a good billing. In spite of this we were constantly being cross checked by the staff & managers about whether or not we had a reservation or we are stags etc . . Stop making your customers feel like trespassers. People will stop visiting if you don't treat your guests with warmth."), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  Bombay Adda
This place is situated at the right place of bangalore and covers two floors.
Bombay Adda is the first franchise outside Mumbai.
Nowadays we all love theme based cafes or restaurant to spend our quality time with best food..
Talking about ambience - it was amazing .. one of its sitting is indoor which will amaze you by its royalness.. and the another one is an open area as they offer outdoor seating (rooftop).
Walking by the two floors one can enjoy Mumbai Wala touch through graffiti wall
Overall great great ambience
Food- Ah.. presentation of food was amazing.. the part was... It is treat to the taste buds definitely.. it might be heavy for the pocket but it definitely worth it.. quality n quantity is too good

Additionally.. one can enjoy drinks .. night life.. dance n everything one want there..

Overall a great place to visit..
You must too..!!'), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED

  Newly opened place, been there on Sunday. Loved the ambience overall. Great job to the team who have designed this place but the service is pathetic. There was a live band performing which was nice so it was full booked...the lady told us to wait until she find a place for us. We waited for 45mins and finally managed to get a drink at the bar counter. We ordered Old Monk the bartender said he have got only Bacardi, I asked him twice he said NO. So we ordered that, after sometime we see a different bartender getting old monk for a different guest, since we were standing there we asked why we were told they were not serving old monk . He started giving excuse that the other guy was new and but it doesn't seem to be. It was such a bad experience.   A new addition to the long list of pubs and hangout joints in Koramangala! Make sure to book your spot well in advance on a weekend !
LetÃ\x83Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x92s get straight to the point
Ambiance: Must say great job done ?? indoor out door n upstairs seating with few high chairs (which are not very comfortable to sit for long time ) the wall n the interiors are best in town

Food
Coastal n Bombay street food menu served with a twist but not new in Bangalore ! The food quantity is very less for the price paid. But yea the taste is good enough.

Music ?
DJ console is at the best spot and the wall is well decorated looks class n it has good music .

Staff
One of the Manager Mr Mohan was very friendly n kind with the smiling face helped us pick the best in the menu

Overall had a great experience great crowd.'), ('Rated 2.0', 'RATED

LetÃ\x83Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x92s get straight to the point
Ambiance: Must say great job done ?? indoor out door n upstairs seating with few high chairs (which are not very comfortable to sit for long time ) the wall n the interiors are best in town

Food
Coastal n Bombay street food menu served with a twist but not new in Bangalore ! The food quantity is very less for the price paid. But yea the taste is good enough.

Music ?
DJ console is at the best spot and the wall is well decorated looks class n it has good music .

Staff
One of the Manager Mr Mohan was very friendly n kind with the smiling face helped us pick the best in the menu

Overall had a great experience great crowd.'), ('Rated 2.0', 'RATED
  Name Ã\x83Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x93AddaÃ\x83Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x94 doesnÃ\x83Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x92t suit you when you are strictly not allowing people on Sunday evening as I believe there is no special event was happening on Sunday as Rohan said we take only couple. This is so ridiculous
If you are not allowing people then how people will experience your place and spread a word.
This is absolutely awkward club rules..'), ('Rated 2.0', 'RATED
  The whole space is quite dekked up and blingy from within
Though they don't have a the "club" factor, it's just another spot for drinks with snacks and a dj who is mostly invisible.

There is something to be said for the attitude of the bouncers who are unnaturally rude to male guests, and they seem to look down at people with a very classist approach.

The food menu was the most unplanned affair, as they have no consistency in the veg and non veg varients, having said that, there is hardly any choice for vegetarians and the quantities are pathetic.

We tried the non veg platter( looked less even for 1 person), the alfredo pasta, and chilly paneer, along with mocktails and drinks

The only saving grace was the chilly paneer and the virgin mojitos that tasted like pre mixed drinks rather than anything special.

So much for the 20 min jam they caused on opening night!
Can be avoided, lest it's weekend and you wish to try a new place for novelty.'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  Drinks - We ordered Mocktails , i felt Rs 350/- For a basic drink is a little too much n 2 of our drinks were just average ....
*chatpata Swizzle - average
*chota aampanna - average
*long and sharp - very good

Food - excellent
Mircliwale aloo with papad - very good
Vada Pav- very good
Chicken tikka - very good
Chowpaty butta chaat- good
Butter chicken bunny chao- very good ?
Caesar salad - good ( quantity was less and plating was just average )


Service - very good
Ambience - Excellent, the place is very tastefully done ??

Over all - had a great time'), ('Rated 1.0', 'RATED
  Bombay Adda - A new kid in the block situated in the heart of the city. It's roots are back in Mumbai and it's trying to weave it's sparkle in Bangalore.

The pictures look classy and the menu tempting. ..but hang on - before hitting the place and walking down their "red carpet" please make sure you do a RESERVATION through ZOMATO so that the super rude manager dosent turn you down or ask you to step aside .

I am sure the place will do good and hopefully the chilled-beer-loving Bangalore crowd is able to endorse the Tinsel town culture of red carpets and bad attitudes .

I wish I could rate it negative owing to the callous attitude and bad behaviour of the staff there but I will rate it -1 until the next time .
Subject to the the condition that I plan my weekend ahead book a reservation through zomato and obviously if the patron decides if we are privileged enough for the Bombay Adda in Bangalore !

Peace
#ahumblefoodie'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  Bombay adda is clearly one of the most happening spots of the city now located in the prime location of Koramangla.

The place has a great ambiance, beautiful interior and good staff. Ladies night on thursdays offer great options for girls to enjoy their drinks while partying away to good music.

The food was interesting and delicious as well. I tried the butter chicken bunny chao and the paneer bruschetta which were both delicious. One of their popular items include the pani puri shots which I noticed several people ordering. They have roof top dining as well. Would recommend this place.

#club#rooftop#bombay#adda#koramangla#foodie'), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED
 
Love the vibe of the place, classic meets funky at this corner. Fusion food is a must try. Love the vibes. Great Dj. And the drinks were so good.. Can't wait to be back"), ('Rated 5.0', "RATED
  It's truely an amazing place down the 7th block. The minute I enter, the place it's Lit with so many yellow led bulbs omg it gives an amazing feel. And the ambiance is something I fell in love with ! From the seating , placement of chairs , tables the bar counter , the smoking area , like actually showing the people who the food is been cooked , the whole set up is so beautiful ! The chandeliers hanging from the ceiling makes the place look even more beautiful ! I was just admiring the place rather than anything else there !
The food and the alcohol were good ! We just ordered a pizza and few drinks that's about it ! A very good place for parties. And chilling on the weekends ! Please visit ."), ('Rated 3.0', 'RATED
  I have to be honest and say that I was highly disappointed with the food. Very average. The place is really nice though. The music and crowd is great as well.'), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  The superb Night club in Koramangala, ambience is very nice with awesome interiors. A must try place.
Food & Service is also up to the mark.')]

name: Spicy Hub
reviews_list:
[('Rated 3.5', "RATED
  Roti is amazing.

  Small place, average food I usually take fulka from here,, good for bachelor's, not very recommended of course unhygienic place not well maintained"), ('Rated 1.5', "RATED
  If you see the prices of the dishes, you might think that it could be an average restaurant. But as you visit there, It's a hell of a place., Small and Unhygienic. seating for max 4 5 people, Its nearby my apartment so I tried once, their paneer butter masala is terrible, Somedays back, Vendor got changer, Still they didn't improve."), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  sapicy hub.....smalle place bt food quality vry good.....'), ('Rated 3.0', 'RATED
  Spicy Hub js very near to SunCity Appartment, near Sarjapur Signal. The place is small with 4tables and siting arrangement for 12-15 people max. Though the place doesnÃ\x83Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x92t has good interior and looks shabby but taste of food Is fine. I have been there twice-once ordered Veg thalli and other time ordered Aloo Peas, Veg Kohlapuri and Phulka. The phulka were really good which we usually donÃ\x83Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x92t get and quite cheap as per quality at Rs10 per piece.

They do deliver in nearby area so better to get hot phulkas and curry at home.'), ('Rated 2.5', 'RATED
  This is the one restaurant which is closest to my apartment and most of the time it serves as a saviour for us. Telling you guys frankly we generally order food from here when we are left with no other option or we are lazy enough to go anywhere. The food here is decent. Last time we ordered malaai paneer tikka, veg Manchurian, ghee rice, roti and paneer tikka masala. Everything was decent. I really like their fulkas. Though I have never eaten at their place but they have small sitting arrangement in their restaurants for approximately 12 to 15 people.'), ('Rated 3.0', 'RATED
  I have to this place two times in days for Dinner. First time when I was there ambience makes it risky. But I was hungry and tired to go for another place near by suncity. Then I ordered thali. They served me peas gravy with dal instead of some other gravy he told me before. When I asked him, he said that gravy item is finished. But both the things were not bad and good as compare to their ambience.
Second time again they served me same curry. Their tava chappati is also good, that you will find rarely.
This is the only place near by suncity. Will try some other items later'), ('Rated 3.5', 'RATED
  Dhabha type place.... But good option for home delivery... Must try is the vegetable Biryani which is served with the different nd delicious salaan although not so traditional type but really amazing... They have good variety of north Indian food also and is easy on pocket...:)'), ('Rated 3.0', "RATED
  This is totally a home delivery review!
They charmed us with a quick service..but we live right across the road so I should not make a big deal out of it.. But yeah i t was quick!
Good variety in the menu .
Now what we had was
CHILLI CHICKEN - okay type... You can try something else...it wasn't that dry too... For a starter dish
CHICKEN MASALA - yummmyy & quite spicy..justifying the name of the joint I guess... But really tasty. Go for it if your taste buds allow a little extra chilly.
TANDOORI ROTI - not exactly the bread you order for home delivery but as he didn't have to travel to deliver our order we made this choice and I feel it wasn't freshly made... It was a little stretchy and chewy...

There was SALAD too... Cucumber and onions.

I'll order again some other variety for sure."), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  Perfect Dhaba place.. Pepper Chicken was something New different to what is usually served.. I think this is a good chakhna joint..
Over all great take away joint for a rainy day??'), ('Rated 3.5', "RATED
  This dhaba is a mostly a daily affair for me (for many people living in and around Suncity apartments). So, the prices are reasonable suited for frequent eating.

Let's discuss specific dishes. See, its not a proper restaurant that can make all dishes good. Dal tadka is brilliant, especially for north indians who miss their proper arhar dal with ghee in Bangalore. So goes with aloo zeera, aloo methi, aloo gobhi and bhindi fry. In paneer gravy, kadhai paneer is quite decent.

Coming to non-veg, biryani varies from day to day. Sometimes it is good, other days it is not so. Better to ask the restaurant owner once and he lets u know honestly. Tandoori chicken is excellent, comparable to many high end restaurant.

For a dhaba, nobody expects a paragraph on customer service. But that's the best part about spicy hub. The guys are amazingly polite and serve well. For regular eaters, even thali is a good option."), ('Rated 3.5', 'RATED
  A decent place to grab some quick food. Very close to Suncity Apartments. Tiny place in terms of area. Not a place you will look forward to when planning a Friday/Saturday night dinner. But definitely a saver if you are returning home late from work on a weekday and are not sure from where to order (provided that you live close by). A bit overpriced but fairly good in terms of taste; not great but good. A suitable place for bachelors/spinsters living in Suncity who are confused, more often that not, about the choice of delivery restaurants. If you are not looking for anything exquisite and just want a decent meal for the day without much searching, order from here.')]

name: The Paramount Hotel

  The Paramount is posh and well equipped for hosting team lunches. You can spot multiple companies' teams coming in and occupying large spaces.

name: Fatty Chang
reviews_list:
[('Rated 3.0', "RATED
  Finding this place isn't a big task, it is situated on the main road itself. A very small outlet like consist of two people but now it's a part of a restaurant next to it . First I thought there are no tables but as being part of a bigger restaurant it's not a problem to dine in.

I went there to get a take away as wanted to experience the outlet.
Food is good not extraordinary but eatable. Order anything and you get momos too, you won't regret the taste as most of the Chinese outlets offer unique food which a limited number of people like.
Price is ok and not that expensive but compared to other outlets it's he same.
Why 3 * ? Because of the quantity it serves for the price which is less. It's doable for one person but who wants that as it's Chinese and we are always used to 1 by 2 so order carefully
Do visit."), ('Rated 1.0', "RATED
  Here's to the worst review I've ever had to write. This really was a terrible try.

I generally order from many place since I enjoy home delivered Chinese. This one was singularly the worst food I've ever eaten.

Not only was it badly prepared, it didn't even resemble what the dish was actually supposed to. While it was cheap, that is no excuse for such a bad display of quality.

I'm certain this place won't survive for long, but yet for the sake of the clientele you're servicing, please do pick up on quality.")]

The place was suspiciously quiet on a Sunday afternoon when it should have been full.'), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  Babayaga is one of the few places which has been successful in establishing itself as American food place in Bangalore. Located on famous 12th main , this place is surely going to impress you with it's some lip smacking cheese dishes, freakshakes & arcade games.

What I liked the most here is nachos, cheese sandwich & the fries."), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  The restaurant/bar has a retroesque feel to it with it's Booths and Tables. The milkshakes are amazing and if you're a fan of Bourbon, then the Campfire is a must try.
The alcohol is pretty reasonably priced and the service with respect to it is also quite quick and efficient.

The food was decent with the Polish Pierogies being a little bland and the Fish and Chips being a tad bit too oily. The lasagna was good and so was the Butter Chicken Pie we had.

Overall I'd recommend this place to anyone who wants to relive a 80-90s dream by playing Arcade Games and Foosball with a few drinks to stir up the fun."), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED

Boozy Shakes


bangalorexpress.blogspot.com'), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  Loved the American Diner concept! Beef chilly and butter chicken pot pie were both extra ordinary, their boozy shakes is a unique concept and the only bar in Bangalore serving this. Great service and very affordable prices. Highly recommended!'), ('Rated 1.0', 'RATED
  Not impressed at all. 

Unfortunately the day we went -- Sunday evening --- No beers (only bottled ones available). 

The food is quite ok-ish. Nothing wow especially for the price you pay. 
For a diner -- the portions were quite stingy. Surely no value for money. 

As  for dinner --- the options for vegetarians is quite limited. 
They have only two burgers --- one with Chutney and the other with Tomato jam.  We ended up ordering "Sides" then :-( 

Asked the waiter to call the chef --and were refused --- we were told that the chef is too busy, so cannot come. 

Definitely not going to this place again. For the White Owl and Geist Beers --- there are other places in Bangalore worth exploring. 

Stay away from this one.'), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED

name: A Bar
reviews_list:
[('Rated 1.0', "RATED
  Terrible decorum. Tomato soup was tomato juice with no taste and sweet. Many mosquitoes. Place looks shady as well. Wouldn't recommend for family at all."), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  Good place to visit. Been here on Saturday night, Music was good. Staff was so polite, , A good place to hang around with friends. Menu is budget friendly.

They really have nice ambiance with the roof top. Convenient place to visit near HSR and BTM.'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  A grt place to hangaround.Been there on sturday evng ..great music with dance floor & Food and drinks were nyc. Specially liked the staff , service was gud. Staff was so polite.'), ('Rated 2.0', "RATED
  The place was completely deserted on a Friday late evening. Quote unusual. Food and drinks were good. But the service was little slow. Liked the ambience, the way they had decorated the place but due to lack of people it wasn't happening."), ('Rated 1.0', "RATED
  I visited this place on a weekday after reading reviews.
Despite being a weekday, service was super slow. Snacks were served a long time after drinks.
Waiters were not responsive and took a lot of time to even bring salt and pepper.
Tomato soup was full of sugar.
We ordered gold coin snacks and it wasn't good. No taste at all. However, snacks were hot and crispy. But we couldn't finish the food.
Not going there again.
Songs they were playing were good
And drinks are expensive than other places in area. So not really pocket friendly."), ('Rated 3.5', 'RATED
  I sort of waded into this place in the middle of the day. I was waiting for someone who was late and wanted to kill time. The entrance to the place from the ground floor looks a bit shady and claustrophobic but once you get to the bar which is in the rooftop, it is spacious and breezy. The place looks ordinary but the booze prices are super pocket friendly and service was good. Of course I did not order much or drink much ( it was the middle of the day!!) but overall was happy. Will try this place again in the evening and update this review...'), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  Ambience-4.5/5
Taste of food-4/5
Varieties of food-3.5/5
Drinks-5/5

Nice place to enjoy with friends. I had been there last week with friends. DJ is good, its newly open so they trying to give there best.')]

name: Hari Super Sandwich
reviews_list:
[('Rated 3.0', 'RATED
  A different way of serving a sandwich. Cut it into small bytes. Taste is unique, however can be improved. Portion size is small. (Normal small bread size)

Service is slow. Probably can give another try.'), ('Rated 5.0', "RATED
  I tried Sandwich at it's main branch in Jayanagar 2 years back and I liked that very much.
Few days back saw it's new outlet in BTM and thought of giving a try.
Here the items we tried :-

* Veg Special Sandwich

* Hari Special Sandwich

* Chocolate Sandwich

* Hari Special Pizza

All Sandwich were good in taste. But if you still ask to prioritize.
Best - Hari Special Sandwich
Second Best - Chocolate Sandwich
Third - Veg Special Sandwich

Pizza was small in size. And it was damn tasty and filling.
Good amount of cheese was there and of good quality too. The toppings used were perfect. Oregano was good too.

Don't like to compare but still I want to tell that it is much better than those Domino's and PizzaHut Pizza.

Cost was Rs 210 including small thumbs up.
But after MagicPin app discount cost was Rs 80 only.
Kind of cherry on top.

Overall awesome experience.
Hope they keep the same quality in future also.
Thumbs Up."), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  Value for money I guess. But was expecting sandwich bread..whereas we got normal bread.
So bottom line portion size is small. So order more if u are hungry. :D')]

name: Cafe D'hide
reviews_list:
[('Rated 5.0', "RATED
  Cafe D'hide is so cozy, you'd wish you went in earlier and spent more time in there. Coming to the food, you know everything on the menu is bound to be good. We ordered the tomato soup,chicken  salad and the paneer wrap on a late evening and it was perfectly balanced and hit the spot. The picturesque instagram feels of the interior and decor add to the experience and you should take a picture next to the cook gnomes at the entrance. The music acoustics of the place is just right and you will feel blessed on a loud saturday night in koramangala."), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  Wasn't here for a long time. Just here to pick a quick cup of coffee. I love the ambience, a good place to read a book or work with a decent menu. The takeaway service was quick. Would come over here sometime again."), ('Rated 3.0', 'RATED
  We went there after reading the positive reviews on Zomato but the place is not worth it. The service is no doubt really good but the food is not that good. There are many places which serve better food in that price!'), ('Rated 3.0', "RATED
  are u looking for a cool place with a good ambiance I think this is u r place. Hanging out in this place for long hours might be fun way to spend u r day , but be aware this is one of those places were the ambiance supersedes the food . No I'm not saying food here is bad but certainly not as good as the ambiance, common problem I noticed was pizza base not baked properly to the fullest, sandwich not toasted to feel Fully crunchy. Chocolate shake was good though, I would say taste is subjective so I would say go form your own opinions. Visit to this place will not be a dissatisfaction for sure . Happy eating Ã\x83Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x83Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82ÃÂ°Ã\x83Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x9fÃ\x83Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x98Ã\x83Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x81"), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  Cafe D'hide is located in Koramangala. I went there with my hubby.It was a nice Place to enjoy with your friends & family.
Food, Taste, and Quality is good. We ordered Fish Burger and Vegetarian Pizza.
The fish burger was quite good. It was big and flavourful burger.
The pizza base was readymade thin-crust base. Pizza mushtooms, broccoli, sweetcorn, bell peppers these toppings were good, but because of ready made dough pizza was not that much good.
The service is good and the ambience is very nice with good & different decor."), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  Cafe D'hide is a nice cozy place in Koramangala. The cafe offers a lot in terms of food, service and ambience. I went there with my family on an afternoon. It was a nice experience.

FOOD, TASTE, AND QUALITY:

We had the English Mustard Fish Burger and D'hide Vegetarian Pizza. The pizza base was not made of in-house fresh dough and it was a readymade thin-crust base which didn't add any much excitement. The toppings were although good and it had mushtooms, broccoli, sweetcorn, bell peppers, and sun dried tomatoes. So, a thumbs down for the pizza base but the toppings were really good.

The mustard fish burger was quite good. It was big and filled with fresh mustard fish, lettuce, and sauces. It was flavourful.

SERVICE AND AMBIENCE:
The service is excellent and the ambience is very nice with good decor and interiors."), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  If you love coffee, this is the place to be. In just 4 visits I have tried all their frappes and I absolutely am in love with them.
Their food is equally good , especially the burgers.
The ambience is just perfect!
Very polite and courteous staff.

Definately recommend this place to all the coffee lovers! :)'), ('Rated 3.0', 'RATED

  Had been here with a friend, the place is lit up and beautifully decorated. It's a small restaurant but good enough for a group of 25-30friends to drop by.
The ambience is amazing. We ordered shakes and juices. The staff was bit slow inspite of booking in advance but that's fine as long as the food is yum."), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  The place in nice and cozy. I had the English breakfast here. There were smileys made on my sunny side up eggs. Loved it. The chicken sausage and chicken bacon was really nice. Fast service.   The place looked pretty in pictures and so decided to pay a visit.

Small place, good ambience. The inside looks like an English railway station with street lights and a huge clock.

Overall average experience with a beautiful ambience.'), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED

  Ordered a veg pizza wrap, chicken Sheek roll and the chicken rice feast. I must say the veg pizza wrap was a sure delight to have. The cheese filled pizza wrap with the right amount of vegetables and jalapeno makes this a perfect bite for a vegetarian diet.

The chicken Sheek roll was tasty and tender with the Sause filled center. I would recommend anyone ordering the rolls to request a reduction in the oil used in the roll; just a personal touch to my taste.
The Chicken rice was a sure delight to indulge. Well cooked and tender pieces pf chicken combined well with the rice a sure taste bud tester. I would surely recommend this meal as a quick and perfect eat for cheat afternoons or late heavy hunger cravings.'), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  Tried the chicken and veg rolls from Faasos as part of the review program.. the rolls were well made with lots of veggies. Also tried their chicken rice feast. But didn't like quality of rice as i felt it was artificially flavoured. Overall a good place for rolls"), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  Good food, quick service. One of my favorite places to order from for a quick bite. They make sure they deliver it on time and its warm. 
Tried the veg rice bowls and it was delicious and spicy.'), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  Faasos is one of my favourite place, as I said earlier. And they letting me review their food is just a cherry on top. The signature wraps are to good to be true. A little sweet for a roll but c'mon who doesn't like sweet dishes."), ('Rated 3.0', "RATED
  Fasoos was gracious enough to make me a part of their review program.

I chose the following items.

Jumbo veg wrap ( Recommended! ) - Perfectly sized for a person's meal, this one had delicious filling.

Paneer tikka wrap ( Very good ) - This was a Maharaja roll and I couldn't finish the entire roll. It was that huge. There was great amount of well cooked paneer. Only drawback of the roll was that it the maida wrap was oily.

Jumbo veg rice - I didn't like the taste of the rice bowl much. Portion size would suffice two people easily. But the taste didn't work for me.

I was surprised that the meal was accompanied by a dessert - chocolate fantasy, even though I hadn't ordered it. Thank you for the surprise Fasoos. The gesture was as sweet as the dessert."), ('Rated 5.0', "RATED
  Last evening I drove back from Mysore and wasn't in a state to cook a meal. We decided to order out and since Faasos delivers rolls, rice and dessert together this was our first choice!

I ordered a Jumbo Chicken Wrap and American Smokey Sausage wrap ( Highly Recommended) for myself.

For rice, I chose Smoked Butter Chicken Rice Feast which was served piping hot and tasted better than what we had expected!
Best part about the meal was the free dessert ( Choco Fantasy) since I'm an elite customer of Faasos!

The delivery and packaging was flawless!"), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  Every time I feel like ordering lunch in the office, faasos comes to my mind as it has kept my experience safe till date. This time I ordered their Jumbo Veg Wrap, Masala Paneer tikka wrap and Chole Signature Rice Feast. Like always their wraps were fresh, cheesy and lip-smacking though I found them bit spicy this time. Chole and rice were delicious and well cooked, I loved it till the last bite. Delivery was quick with neat packaging. A complimentary drink was there too i.e. Wonderz milk in mango flavor and sunfeast in really doing some wonders here as I just loved the drink with small chunks of mangoes in it.'), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  Tried Faasos once again for their delicious wraps and smoked butter chicken rice feast. As always, the delivery and packaging were bang on! The food arrived fresh, warm, and ready to be gobbled.

Have tried the Chicken Jumbo Wrap before - trust me, it's much bigger than you think, and of course, super filling. The Chicken Mayo Wrap is comparatively smaller but comes with a generous helping of mayonnaise and chicken. Add their Teekha Chaska seasoning and you're good to go!

The Smoked Butter Chicken Rice Feast was okayish this time around. For what it is, there's more rice than curry and it would take a hardcore rice-eater to finish this dish up once you've already had the wraps. Nonetheless, Faasos continues to stay consistently good in terms of quality and on-time delivery!

instagram.com"), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED

name: The Big O Bakes
reviews_list:
[('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  You get the best desserts in town here! From variety to flavour,they have something new to offer every time. I am a fan of their chocolate and red velvet cakes.'), ('Rated 5.0', "RATED
  If you are a cake fan then,'The Big O Bakes' is just the perfect place for you! They have the most fantastic and delicious chocolate cakes and you are just spoilt for choice every single time."), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  The best red velvet cupcakes in town....
Be it the cake or the cupcakes they are worth dying for. I have also tried the seasonal flavours they are just amazing!! Always a favourite..
Recommend ????'), ('Rated 1.0', "RATED
  Pathetic .don't even consider of ordering your cupcakes from here as they will not be available ,idk what they up to. Doesn't pick calls at time. Tells to order after a week and fails to pick. This is not how you treat the costumers!!"), ('Rated 5.0', "RATED
  They bake and serve the best customised cakes ever. You name it and you get it, with a wide range of lip-smacking special flavours. You will relish every bite that melts in your mouth.  You get what you expect and its totally worth every rupee you pay. the best part of these bakers are that they never say NO! its always a positive reply and bake in any size from a needle to the aeroplane. Each cake is perfectly shaped and moulded. Suitable for any and every occasion if you haven't placed your order yet its time to place it soon :)"), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  They are masters in Cake.
I got my PINK FLOYD cake from this bakery shop and it is the best cake i ever had and it was a master piece the way it was done.
Highly recommended place.'), ('Rated 5.0', "RATED
  There's a difference between cake and CAKE and that's the bench mark TBOB has set. Absolutely love the dark chocolate salted caramel cake & the seasonal strawberry cream cake which i ordered recently.
Bakes: 5/5
Quantity: 5/5
Service: 5/5
Good job, Lakhan!"), ('Rated 5.0', "RATED
  So it's Valentine's Day and you're still waiting for somebody to pamper you!
This was me until I ordered the cake in a jar! So stop waiting and get ordering! Now!
The jars look so good and delicious that I did not feel like opening them and finishing it!
It's the perfect flavours as it comes in strawberry, red velvet and my all time favourite chocolate!
The big o bakes is definitely the next place I order cakes from!
Yummy in your tummy guaranteed!"), ('Rated 1.0', "RATED
  Disappointing.
When I call to order, they say it's closed for a few days.
After a few days, when I order on zomato, they refuse to accept my order."), ('Rated 5.0', "RATED
  One of the best place in BSK to get all your desserts & celebration cakes. Cakes are crafted to perfection, love their vintage & chic cakes. And coming down to desserts, I vouch for their banoffee pie, red velvet cake, Nutella cupcakes, #BestEver ? and more over this is run by an independent owner who's just 20yrs old and absolutely killing it. Good job Lakhan."), ('Rated 5.0', "RATED
  So I've ordered from Lakhan about 2 times now and have had the most wonderful experience! His cakes are just so amazing ! They are always better than what you'd expect ! The red velvet cupcakes are to die for ! And he customises the cakes/ cupcakes to near perfection ! Would definitely recommend ordering from here the next time you need to celebrate a special occasion ! Tried the shooter cupcakes with baileys and jack Daniels and man were they amazing! Even if you don't have any idea about what flavours go together ,don't worry ,he'll guide you thought it :) also the price is very reasonable and if you request ,he's kind enough to deliver it to you as well !Nitheesha Daka"), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  The big o bakes is one of the best places to get well made, exquisite and luxurious cupcakes. Their cupcakes are a must try and I strongly suggest people to try their cupcakes and custom cakes'), ('Rated 5.0', "RATED
  Well, TBOB is one the best place to have cupcakes and customised cakes. I regularly order from TBOB. Their cakes are very neatly done in terms of fondant detailing. Their cupcakes are just mind blowing. Especially red velvet with cream cheese and chocolate cupcake with Nutella filling. Customised cakes are brilliantly done. Designs in TBOB are very unique. It is one of the best place in banglore for dessert lover's. Highly recommended. Thumps up

Value for money : 5/5
Taste : 5/5
Design : 5/5
Presentation :5/5"), ('Rated 4.5', 'RATED
  One of the Youngest baker in town I must say, Well i have tried red velvet cup cakes which is brilliant n you can never miss out on variety ! All of their cake flavours are amazing "You can dream a cake to any extent " I would highly recommend you for wedding cakes'), ('Rated 5.0', "RATED
  Hands down !! This is the best place for brownies and desserts , there is no way one can't deny this fact after having tasted their cup cakes , muffins and tarts they remain on top of my list of favourites !! Their customised cakes are WORK OF ART , brilliant work well designed and very neat ! This place is the only place you should think of for any occasions for that matter !! Must try their macaroons , strawberry sensation , key lime pie , banana muffins and JD truffles I assure you , an orgasmic experience ! ?"), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  Their customized cakes are one of the best ways of surprising someone! Be it any cake, it just melts in your mouth. They have the best chocolate cakes. Red velvet with cream cheese is a must try!'), ('Rated 5.0', "RATED
  Red Velvet fan?
They've got the BEST RED VELVET CAKES. ?
I regularly order from TBOB, they are just too addictive and every time I call them to place an order they've got something new on board. ?"), ('Rated 5.0', "RATED
  Ordered their cakes, cupcakes and other motherlovin' goodies. When perfection is executed and delivered each and every time you know it is made by a baking god. Ordered cakes for my birthday... Will order in the future for my bachelor party, wedding and baby shower, hopefully in this order ?
Cheers."), ('Rated 5.0', "RATED
  This place beats almost every other dessert place there is in town! Was very low profile so far and I'm glad that it's finally out and ready!! I get all the birthday cakes here, my cupcakes and almost everything sweet from here!
Very decently priced as well!
If you're in Bangalore and want something for someone's birthday or even for a guilty binge, this is the place!!")]

name: Chickpet Donne Biryani House
reviews_list:
[('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  Scrumptious and delicious biryanis with the perfect appetizers to go along with the meal. Service is very humble and friendly. Great experience. I recommend visiting to experience a good biryani meal.'), ('Rated 3.0', "RATED
  It's a small outlet near Commercial Market. They don't have too many items (only about 10-12) to serve. We ordered one chicken biryani and a Telegu style chilli chicken. I know the combination is horrible but we didn't have enough options to choose from. The chilli chicken was extremely spicy but tasty. Even the biryani was okayish too.

Cheers to food! Cheers to life!

Pocket pinch: 400 for two")]

I ordered the Chinese Chopsuey and the Honey Chilli Chicken, and found that both dishes were incredibly tasty. The service is a little slow, and the prices could be a little lower, all in all, it's a great place for some Chinese on the go."), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED

  Hot and sour soup, sweet corn chicken soup, chilli chicken, beef, hakka noodles and flat noodles are nice. Chilli chicken is a bit spicy(and slightly oily) but I liked the flavour. You get to choose the sauce and vegetables that you'd like with your rice or noodles."), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
