name: House Of Commons
reviews_list:
[('Rated 3.0', "RATED
  The name justifies this place. It is the house of commons, the drinks and the food are dirt cheap but not that of an ambiance. Can be your month end drink joint. Location is prime, the crowd might be disappointing at times but the price you pay here, you can't expect anymore."), ('Rated 3.0', 'RATED
  Ordered only chicken tandoori lollypop-3.5/5. Tasted good but very spicy. Ambience was good and the staff polite. I found the music a bit too loud.'), ('Rated 3.0', 'RATED
  Ambience - 3/5    Food - 3/5  Service - 3.5/5  VFM - 3.5/5  Parking - No

House of Commons is one of the popular pubs of Koramangala and is usually crowded on weekends. We went there to celebrate a new job and could barely manage a table on Sunday evening. The interior and decor is quite nicely done and waiters are polite.
We offered a pitcher of craft beer Geist Weiss Guy and a Melon Passion Cooler. The German style beer was not very strong and went well with the French Fries. The other starter we ordered was Egg Chilli, which was too oily and spicy for my liking.
Really not a place for any food, the place does justice to its popularity as a pub.'), ('Rated 3.0', "RATED
  Had heard a lot about this place.
Went and tried the veg burger, nachos and French fries they were pretty okay

Nachos weren't that great. 3.5/5
French Fries were okay. 3/5
Veg burger also was fine. 3/5"), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  Heard lot about this place and last Sunday got chance to visit this place. Very chill out place with lot of space and happening people. The price is way to low incompare to other bar/pub. We ordered 2 beer tower for 1200.
Suggestions- visit this place before 7:00PM to avail heavy discount on drinks.

Location-10/10
Ambiance-8/10
Service-8/10
Drinks/food- 7/10
Variety- 7/10'), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  The food is amazing, the service is very prompt and the ambience is really good. Their song collection is really good. This place is a must go ?'), ('Rated 1.0', "RATED
  Worst service ever .. Hardly 3-4 tables were booked still they couldn't get food in 25-30mins. Food wasn't worth the wait, had to cancel the main course order and pack food from outside."), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  I loved this place, but I have to admit, the service is quite slow. The cocktails are pretty great, and the food too. Located in the heart of Koramangala, I'd expect the service to be a tad bit faster, even if there is a crowd (which, on that day, wasn't much). Overall, loved the vibe there and the music is amazing."), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  House of Commons all the way. I am a big fan of the HSR one, so planned to visit the Koramangala as well. Beautiful food, smooth alcohol and courteous staff, the prime factors which HOC is known for, is on point. On top of that, good music and prime location works well for a memorable night out.'), ('Rated 3.0', "RATED
  I got a table without waiting on a Saturday night, great start!

The place is beautifully decorated and seated but it was very loud. Having a dinner conversation isn't possible here.

But the food, the chicken pizza I had one of the best crusts I've ever had. Soo cripsy and fresh. It was definitely over priced for that quantity. The fries were okay and the drinks were fine."), ('Rated 3.0', "RATED
  HOC.. House of Commons is one of my favourite bar in the 5th Block.
Very sadly, they don't have Zomato Gold here of any kind, or else House of Commons would have been my the only 'go to hangout' place in Bangalore, literally.

The ambience is great, just the way i like -  no fuss of couple/stag entry and all that nonsense, with some good music taste

The food is average, tbh. Its no different and neither very good. Just the usual stuff.

Good variety of drinks/beverages available.

The service is also average but can be a lot better as they have a good amount of staff, but all lack professionalism and courtesy.

Coming to price, that's simply amazing! I like this place mainly only because of two things - ambience and pricing. Thats it!

Overall rating: 3.5/5"), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  Have been here a couppe.of times. Good place. Decent prices. Loved the house of commons bread basket. Recommend it for couples and groups of friends alike.'), ('Rated 5.0', "RATED

  Seeing that this place had a 4.9 rating, I had high expectations. Ordered a couple of drinks and the fungi pizza. The pizza was good (not great though) .   It's a great place to chill with friends. The price is reasonable. The food is good. The staffs are polite and friendly. The ambience is decent. We tried onion rings, Peri Peri chicken, French fries, and vanilla icecream."), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  It is a nice place with very friendly staff.Food is good and served fresh.We had ordered:
1.Lemon grass chicken - The flavour of lemon grass could have been a little stronger.The chicken was soft and juicy with a nice taste.
2.Tandoori chicken: it was finely done with correct amount of spice blend and served with a nice dip and spicy onion rings.
3.Chicken basket-worth a try.Batter fried chicken served with French fries and spicy mayo dip.It was good and really filling.
4.Funghi pizza: An awesome combination of shiittake mushrooms on pizza.It was very light and nicely done with cheese that leaves a burst of flavours on your tongue.
5. Complementary mocktails:Banana smoothie and Citrus melon punch: both were good and refreshing.
Overall a good plce to visit with your friends.
Reasonable price.
Keep up the good work!!'), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED

The drinks were good and presentation was really nice. It's a budget friendly place, with loud music and good ambience. However, for me, the service was a let down. They seemed to be in a bit of rush, handed over the bill before we finished. While it's not a big deal, there are little things that should be taken care of, that make a place perfect. Hence the 4 stars."), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  It's a great place to chill with friends. The price is reasonable. The food is good. The staffs are polite and friendly. The ambience is decent. We tried onion rings, Peri Peri chicken, French fries, and vanilla icecream."), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  It is a nice place with very friendly staff.Food is good and served fresh.We had ordered:
1.Lemon grass chicken - The flavour of lemon grass could have been a little stronger.The chicken was soft and juicy with a nice taste.
2.Tandoori chicken: it was finely done with correct amount of spice blend and served with a nice dip and spicy onion rings.
3.Chicken basket-worth a try.Batter fried chicken served with French fries and spicy mayo dip.It was good and really filling.
4.Funghi pizza: An awesome combination of shiittake mushrooms on pizza.It was very light and nicely done with cheese that leaves a burst of flavours on your tongue.
5. Complementary mocktails:Banana smoothie and Citrus melon punch: both were good and refreshing.
Overall a good plce to visit with your friends.
Reasonable price.
Keep up the good work!!'), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  This is the most budget friendly place according to me. It's my go to place. Fries, chilly baby corn all are excellent and the beer is good ! Cheers :)"), ('Rated 3.0', 'RATED
  Pocket friendly place to drink and dine with friends. Ambience is not good. Music was really bad. It spoiled the whole mood. Food is average. Happy hours are good.'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  I had ordered the following items -

  A stunning place, also kinda crowded we had to sit at the smoking section. Non smokers be like? well talking about the food, tasted almost similar. Loved the cocktail. Ambiance, was good.   Met a long lost friend here. It is a great place to have some beers with friends and chat.
The music is good but not too loud, which means that you don't to shout to talk to your friends.
They serve only bottled beers and have. Decent ambiance.
The food is good not great.
Service is good too."), ('Rated 3.0', "RATED
  House of commons it's a great place, staff were great, food was also good. But, they lack in providing a great service. It took them almost an hour to get food to the table, that too after several reminders. Apart from that I have no complaint. I really hope that next time they would change my mind."), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  Located on the busiest street of Koramangala, they do not have parking space. Lots of seating capacity. Sitting on the high chairs for long durations were a bit painful. The service was quick and the place is lively.

We were here for a meetup, good music and great food, everyone had a good time. The options for vegetarians were less. We only had starters and cocktails. Paneer chilli and babycorn manchurian were spicy and yummy. Paneer tikka was average taste. French fries and chilli mayonnaise dip was good.

Would come back here to try out the main course andhe other dishes.

Food : 3.5/5
Service : 4/5
Ambience : 4/5'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED

Mr pallash took great care of us being really courteous and assisted us with the menu,

  Visited this place on a weekday, so it wasn't so crowded. This place looks basic from the outside but is a different story once you enter it. It has two levels of seating and the other night the ambience was just comfortable. Ordered for a Fantasy mocktail and Cheesy Loaded Fries. The chicken in the dish didn't feel very fresh to me and before I could complain, one of their staff came ahead for feedback already. To make up for that they replaced the concerned dish with another chicken item of our choice. What arrived later was good. name: Aha Juice Bar
reviews_list:
[('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  Veg Crunchy Cheese Sandwich is super awesome. In general everything is good and hygenic. Cut fruits plate is very wholesome as well. Haven't tried many juices and milkshakes, but i keep having Sandwich and it's one good place for Sandwiches and Juice."), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  One of the best juice bars in BTM. Specially their sandwiches and the fruit bowl with ice cream. The Paneer mushroom sandwich is just awesome. The stuffing that the sandwich is yum!!!!'), ('Rated 3.5', "RATED
  strategically best located at lake road , in front of lake road coffee day and at the junction of 7th main. serves really well breakfast to many bachelor's in that area. mostly I go for dosa or poha which is unlike regular poha but really filling. juices and other snacks are worth the money. not enough place to sit out but service is good. cheers."), ('Rated 4.5', 'RATED
  Serves a variety of juices. The fruit plate is also awesome, for 40 rupees it is worth the price. And also a nice place for breakfast. And serves ice creams as well.'), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  Had fruit dish and surprised to see the quantity, Couldn't finish on my own, Menu was quite interesting, Will visit again for breakfast soon."), ('Rated 4.5', 'RATED
  I have been here 3 times and this is kind of becoming my go to place to tackle my evening hunger. I have only tried the rolls here and they are a treat. They fillings are too good. I have also had dry fruit juice, the only place in this area serving this. The quality of food is very good and hygienic. It serves quality in quantity.'), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  I like the sandwich , fruit bowl, good place to have snack's n juice

Only option I didn't find is tea , I was there when it was raining :)"), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  on the way to home  i was hungry , i had juice then i thought of eating Roll ... it was awsome....:) , i could see sugar cane juice in there menu , wooooh i had 2 juice

i am quite regular , i tried Dosa in the morning with fruit bowl.... Place is good , clean'), ('Rated 4.5', 'RATED
  I have been here a couple of time. Mostly for juice but the other day I happen to have the sandwiches. The sandwiches are really filling and tasty. Worth every penny. The staff is good and the small place is maintained well with outdoor minimal seating. A must try if you are driving that way.')]

name: CakeZone
reviews_list: [('Rated 3.0', 'RATED\n  Took a home delivery via zomato. 1 mini chocolate jar, 1 mini tiramisu jar. Though the chocolate jar cake was good. Disappointed.'), ('Rated 5.0', "RATED\n  Ordered for chocolate truffle cake, it's very soft and very delicious and worth for money, will try some other pastry and cake as well ?????????")]

name: New Alameen Restaurant
reviews_list: [('Rated 3.0', "RATED\n  Had their Chicken Biryani a few days back and it's my first experience with this joint. name: The Pipe Rack
reviews_list:
[('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  Visited this place over the weekend with a couple of friends. And I must say we made the right choice. Awesome Hookahs with mouth watering food, beautiful ambiance and the most friendly waiters.
CanÃ\x83Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x92t wait to visit you all again ?'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  The pipe rack is new addition to Kalyan Nagar and it is one of the beautiful place with comfortable sofas , chairs and swings !
Talking about the food ? - It is good as I had veg pizza ? which was up to the mark with species all over.
Next letÃ\x83Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x92s jump to the service provided : It was very good as there is not much crowd so you can expect a good service and attention!
Lastly (my favourite part) is ambience, this I think you can tell better how is the ambience!!
Conclusion is : you can hangout and chill , it is good cosy place !'), ('Rated 5.0', "RATED
  The Pipe Rack is one of the few places I can call home.
Hookah : 5/5
Food : 5/5
Ambience : 4/5( I'd prefer lower volume music in the afternoon)
Service : 5/5

Owners are always available to address concerns , luckily I didn't have any but feels good to know they're there if I need them.
Food variety is really good. So is the taste, quantity and it's moderate pricing.

This is probably the only Sheesha Cafe in Kalyan Nagar I'd happily visit again.
Love the privacy areas for couples too.
If I had to change something, it would be the fact that smoking should be permitted only in certain areas.
I'm sure there are people like me that do sheesha but don't prefer the cigarettes.
All in all, I'd highly recommend this place to my followers,friends and family.

Kudos to The Pipe Rack team! Thank you for making me feel at home.")]

name: Thran
reviews_list:
[('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  So good.  Had beef and pork bulgogi dishes....  The only reason I can't give it five stars, is that the portions were a little small for the price point. Otherwise, great flavors, great food. Small, little hole in the wall, with no real ambience...but the food was GREAT!"), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  Thran serves delicious as well as filling Korean food!!
Even the side dishes are made with perfection.
We ordered kimbap and they served us clear soup, kimchi, korean potatoes and vegetables as the side dish. It was yummy. Then we ordered dumpling ramyun( ramen) and at last chicken bulgogi. The flood was exploding with flavors and was amazing. Will surely come back , the staff was very friendly. They even served us fruits in the end. All this food was shared by 3 people and it was very very veryyyy filling. Thran recently got renovated and it's even better."), ('Rated 5.0', "RATED
  One of my favorite places in this part of Bangalore. Especially love the hot pots here. Pair it with a little sake and it's awesome. Love the complimentary plate they serve while you wait for your order.

The portions are very much on the higher side. Have never been able to finish the dishes I've ordered.

Nothing much to say about the ambience. The place is clean and neat but I go here purely for the food."), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  Tried Korean food for the first time, believe me TASTY, place is small but maintained well, has a nice vibe, food is tasty and the staff is good, u have people who speak good English and the menu has pics which makes it easy to decide what u want.'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  Have been wanting to visit this place since so long and I am so glad I did. Had the kimchi Ramen and Chicken Bolgogi. The Ramen was spicy and tasted really good. Definitely worth a visit. The place is nice and cozy and the staff is courteous too. P. S. DonÃ\x83Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x92t forget to try all the sides they serve you and also the Cinnamon Tea and fruits that they serve in the end!'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  Lovely little place for Korean food. Looks and feels like a home rather than a restaurant but that adds up to the cozy feel. We went to especially try the ramen but it was not available that day, no matter the other options in the menu were great as well. The food is very well presented and the staff are courteous.'), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  thank you Thran, for giving some amazing Korean dishes to munch on.. delicious and completely satisfying. We had the veg kimbap, sea food ramen, chicken bulgogi tuna bibim and veg fried ramen. Great time!'), ('Rated 3.0', "RATED
  So I tried Korean Food for the first time ever!!!!!!!!! ?
So we ordered :
1) Dolsot Bibimbap
2) Nakji Deopbap
3) Vege kimbab
4) Fried ramen
5) Chicken Bulgogi
Checkout my next post for the video. ? . . . .

I m not a big fan of Korean Food that's why I'm rating this place 3/5 but my friends really loved the dishes and they said it tasted authentic. So if you are bug fan of Korean cuisines then you must checkout this place."), ('Rated 3.0', "RATED
  wanted to visit Than for ages but since it's closed on Sundays it took a while.

The food was average- kimbab rice was tad overcooked and mushy, stews were bland,
jjambbong had a few too many shrimp heads. Overall the food was average slightly on the lightly seasoned taste, nothing really wrong but nothing that strikes you as wow.

no beverage to speak of, except for coke and sprite."), ('Rated 3.0', "RATED
  Not one of the best experiences I've had so far visiting Korean restaurant. Service was great but it's disheartening when the items you ordered were unavailable. Food was okay not the best either. The prawn spring roll was okayish, kimbab did not look the most attractive but nevertheless tasty. Osam Bulgogi which is a marinated squid and pork barbecue tasted just fine. Sitting arrangement also feels rather cramped inside the small room but this I believe can be ignored as long as the food is great. The only thing which I enjoyed the most visiting here was the bakery. Everything I got from there was great. Will definitely visit the bakery again and see if I'd like to give another try for the restaurant.

foodietrek.com")]

name: Delhi Home Food
reviews_list: [('Rated 5.0', 'RATED\n  Very tasty food, I liked thali. North Indian thali was very tasty and was reasonable. Thali had 3 rotis, jeera rice,dal,curd,allo jeera dry and rajma.')]

name: The Foodyz
reviews_list:
[('Rated 3.0', "RATED
  Ambiance - The place is located in a narrow street surrounded by smoking joints. The ambiance is simple. Uncomfortable.
The smoke from the smoking joints made the experience very unpleasant.
Folks eating there were also mostly bachelor guys. There weren't families.

Price - Affordable

Taste - We tried the following items.

Aloo paratha was served with curd and pickle - Tasted really good
Jeera rice was served with dal - Was served a large portion of rice and it was well-made.
Gobi pepper fry - Again a large portion enough for two individuals were served. Delicious it was. Must try!

Ordering food from this place would be a great idea as the food is tasty and atmosphere unpleasant."), ('Rated 5.0', "RATED
  the kind of place JP Nagar has been waiting for long. It is for Students, working professionals, families. you can grab a quick snack and drinks or or your you can dine in & enjoy their delicious Tandoori-punjabi items.

most importantly they now serve poha. so you don't have to rush to Shoppers Stop or BTM.

do try their Lassi & Papad Masala.")]

name: Gama Gama
reviews_list:
[('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  Sunday Noon and my friend and I were damn hungry and we had spoken earlier we wanted to go here.

First impressions

ItÃ\x83Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x92s next to a Dominos outlet, and there were very few people but there were many people working in the kitchen but the ambience was quite peaceful.

Service

It is a self serviced outlet and the staff were busy for most of the time we were there. So was the manager/owner who was there next to the staff, doing what the staff did too.

Food

We ordered Mandakki Oggarne, Paddu, Talipattu and Mirchi Bajji. Apart from the Mandakki, all the other items were amazing and ofcourse its not a fast food joint, so they took their time to make it in the best way they could.

PS - Talipattu is a must try


Over all IÃ\x83Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x92d say its a 4/5 only for their sheer lack of understanding of customer service. Hope they are most receptive to the walk-in customers.'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  Nice place near to kamakya theatre, decent food , girmit was good and worth trying , sabudana vada is nice with less oil ,

Ambience:3/5
Food:3.5/5'), ('Rated 3.0', "RATED
  Ambiance - I really like the rock solid wood furniture used to do up this place and the open kitchen where you can literally see the ladies cooking multiple orders simultaneously.

Service - Some dishes are pre-prepared and they take their own sweet time to prepare the other dishes.

Price - The prices are on the higher side when compared to the quantity, taste and prices of the other restaurants offering North Karnataka cuisine.

Taste - We tried the following items.

Mandaakki oggarane - Was bland. Didn't like it.

Mirchi bajji - Was served hot yet wasn't great.

Millet taalipattu - Best among the dishes tried here. Really healthy and has a unique taste that I haven't got to taste elsewhere.

Girmit - Was too spicy to finish.

Shenga holige - Good

Jowar roti with curry - Tasty but isn't worth the price.

* If at all I revisit this place, I would like to try millet bisibelebath."), ('Rated 2.0', 'RATED
  Unfortunately, this hotel wont survive long.

1. Self Service and highly priced
2. Absolute mess in the weekend
3. Mismanagement of orders
4. There is no token system
5. Lastly, taste is not worth the price.
6. 170 rupees charged for limited 2 rottis.
7. There is no follow up service for people who need dishes and sambhars during the dinner/lunch

I would not recommend this restuarant for a peaceful meal'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  One of the best North karnataka restaurant in the area. Bit pricy compared to other north karnataka eateries, but better option compared to other eateries in and around kamakya. Crowded on weekends and I happen to visit on a Saturday.

I happen to try the below things:

1. Jolad Rotti(Jawar rotti): basic nothing special with it. Brinjal Palya was tasty. 3.5/5

2. Holige: we tried their Shenga holige which was average, I like the fact that it was fresh and tasty.
Bele holige was prepared fresh it was good too. 4/5

3.mirchi bajji: good. They use fresh oil. 3.5/5

My Ratings: overall 3.5/5

Food: good: 3.5/5

Ambience: cleaner than any other north karnataka eatery: 4/5

Service: Slow. But you get the fresh food. 3/5


With Love
Thejaswini Mv'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  A simple clean and hygienic self service restaurant serving North Karnataka dishes. There are only about 8 to 10 tables and thus be prepared to wait during peak hours. Enjoyed Girmit, Holige, Sabudhana Vada among other dishes.')]

name: Chilli Flakes
reviews_list:
[('Rated 2.0', "RATED
  This was Zomato Delivery order.
Usually we try new restaurant every time we order from Zomato, this time it was Chilli Flakes.

We ordered Corn Spenich & cheese sandwich, Smoked Burger & Momos.

Momos were 10 pcs, packaging was ok. Sauce was different then what we usually get at other outlet but it was ok. Momos were also nice.

Sandwich was not good as it was grilled in oil or the stuffing was made in it and we feel it's a cheap oil as we don't get such flavour and smell in any other sandwich we had till date. Due to this it didn't taste good. Filling was kind of ok, there was no filling on the edges. Packing was nice it was wraped in wraping paper inside a big box.

Smoked burger was also ok, there was negligent vegetables present. Only 1 pc of cucumber, there was no tomato or lettuce. Also I mentioned no onions in special instructions but still there was onion.
There was smell in burger as well. Patty was fried in same oil.

Overall it was not a good experience.")]

name: Chapati House
reviews_list:
[('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  Tried ordering some paranthas and chapatis to test for the first time. A pure vegetarian restaurant that offers a lot of varieties in menu. Aloo Parantha was filled with a lot of masala which was good to see and was sumptuous. Chapatis were soft too. The only thing which was missing was salt in paranthas but nevertheless good experience and now I can try their curries.'), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  I like the attitude of this restaurant, very polite staff and feedback orientated. Food is delicious and well garnished with vegetables and probiotics.

Would suggest customers to give orders with taste preferences on spices (For south indian- Because they like extra spicy).
Otherwise food is made with standard and moderated masala combination.

This place is perfect for quick grabbers, colleague/family food time. But not suitable for dating and all. Parking space isn't planned and surrounding of the place isn't clean.

Take this as suggestions (Restaurant) otherwise you are awesome.

Food- 5 Stars
Staff- 5 stars
Surrounding of restaurant- 1 star
Ambience of restaurant- 3 stars"), ('Rated 3.0', 'RATED
  A decent new restaurant with a decent setup. Needs to stabilise food, oveall old experience. Staff was courteous, food was quickly prepared. Pricing was decent.')]

name: Paratha Xpress
reviews_list:
[('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  This was a beautiful little find in my way home from a long evening walk. Since this place was new I did notice it before. Always love a great paratha.

Ambience: (3/5)
This is not the ideal place to sit and leisurely eat. It?s most of a need based dinning. There are two tables/chairs where one can sit down. The place is kept relatively clean.

Food: (5/5)
Absolutely loved the parathas. Firstly many of the Parathas here costs like 50 INR. These are the conventional ones. I got the aloo and the Palak paratha. Both were incredible. Loved first how big each of them were. The stuffing was also generous by the owner. Also loved how it was allowed to cook so well. The flavours were great

Summary: (5/5)
Great place to grab a quick bite or ideally a great place to order some fantastic food home. Recommended.'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  Perfectly cooked and well stuffed paranthas. Order today! Properly balanced in spices and economical with the oil. Accompanying chutney is a welcome surprise :)'), ('Rated 5.0', "RATED
  Delivery was spot on. I had ordered 2 parathas, 1 aloo pyaj and 1 manchurian cheese.. Both the parathas tasted good and totally value for money if you're looking for quick bite which can be fulfilling as well!!")]

name: Kitchen On Table
reviews_list:
[('Rated 3.0', "RATED
  We had below items and all are good. I won't say something highly recommendable. The price is high as per quantity and quality.
Chrispy thaichi chicken, dragon makki, BBQ hot wings, lemon grass chicken, thai chilli prawn, mickey mouse"), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  Food: Many starter varieties are there. Food is not spicy. Some food taste really good but, Still not recommended for spicy food lovers. Not the place at all! For a different food experience you can visit here!

Place: We can either choose live table or normal table. Live table is where the chef will prepare certain dishes in front of you entertaining too! He did some card magic too later ! ???

Cost: starters anywhere between 230-400 I guess! Fried rice was 280 and noodles too with the same price!

Service: Very good! Keep it up guys! But a little late in preparing food! Could improve in that!'), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  If you want to experience live cooking on table, then this is the place to be. Went here for team lunch. Waiter serving us showed few magic tricks and juggling skills as well. Food is good in taste. I felt the variety is less for the price they charge.'), ('Rated 2.0', "RATED
  A very innovative concept executed poorly and falls flat on the face kind of place. Oh what a rhyme! Even more pathetic was their service.
Me and a friend decided to try this place for an early dinner and ordered for a grilled fish Satay and
Spiced salmon maki.
The Satay was sweet in taste which was a little weird, but what irked us more is that the maki was just plain. Not the usual spicy types, and the restaurant manager tells us that's how it is supposed to be. And refuses to even incorporate feedback. Also, the wasabi was strangely pretty bland.
Oh and we were seated on the social sharing tables meant for live cooking and the chef who was performing the live cooking act was actually so energetic with his huge knives and cutlery that it was all over the place and enough to freak us out.
Damage: Rs 1100 and definitely not recommended. They need to work on their service a lot, and for god's sake train the staff."), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  Wow.. simply wow. Please visit this place and ask for Mr. JUNE.... he is the head chef and the owner pf the place. What a lovely and talented man. Very funny. Makes yummy food. Came all the way from Philippines to make us happy. He will always say... I am June, before July. I loved it. Loved him.. cheers to this place. Love from Punjab ?'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  The restaurant is having good concept. The service is good with magic tricks. We liked Susi and they were delicious. We went for Saturday lunch and it was almost empty and got good service.'), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  Easy to locate.
Ambiance not great.
But food is yammi.
The chef who cooks live.. really has got lots of talent.
Japanese starters.. where perfectly cooked. As per our choice. Value for money.
Suggestion go with group you will get a whole table and a
personalized chef.
Enjoyed his card tricks. Perfect place for a family
Will go back.'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  Had seen this place on zomato and wanted to try cause of concept.. Chef June is the lifeline of this place.. he makes your experience and food fun ,great & magical..

Go for experience and have fun..
Best try outs among what i did is saute veggies.. spicy noodles and fried rice.

One improvement veg fried rice had just carrot and onions.. but nothing can beat the taste..

Its also pocket friendly..
Rating is for the experience..couldnt take pics sorry'), ('Rated 3.0', "RATED
  We decided to go to this place for my friend's birthday celebration. This place is based on a concept of social dining, so if you seek for privacy on your table, then this might not be the place. So we were seated on a 7 seater table with another family, and ordered our own items. So their menu is divided in two parts, and they have buffet as well. There are only a couple of items which they prepare on the table in front of your eyes. We ordered for soup, mushroom starters and noodles. Both the mushroom starters and noodles were prepared in front of us. The staff I must say are very friendly. Our chef for that day, showed various magic tricks and other skills.
The food was decent too."), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  Kitchen on a table provides you with a very unique dining experience and authentic Asian food. 

The restaurant looks average in terms of interior decoration but it is the food they specialize in. I and my friend opted for a buffet. The starters were pretty good. We couldn't get enough of it. The main course dishes were cooked by the chef right in front of us on our table. Literally, a kitchen on the table! They also kept the audience engrossed by showing some card tricks. The quantity of the main course dishes was good. However, the main course food items were not as great as the starters in terms of taste. 

Overall, if you want to have some delicious finger licking food with some entertainment then you should surely visit this place!"), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  If youÃ\x83Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x92re craving for genuinely good food with personalised entertainment, this is the best place to visit. On my first visit I opted for separate table but that that day I decided that I surely need to go back and enjoy the live table, and so we did. Our family had a memorable time with Mr. June , who impressed everyone with his live juggling and magic while we gorged on the finger licking food cooked right in front of us. Keep it up!')]

name: Jashn - Le Meridien
reviews_list:
[('Rated 4.5', 'RATED
  Been here quite a few times and never leaves me disappointed. I always leave feeling fresh despite having eaten quite a bit, a testament to their good food made with high quality ingredients.'), ('Rated 3.0', 'RATED
  The menu is very limited and the food on offer is quiet ordinary.we tried the fish hariyali and a pizza from their other restaurant menu from lebrasserie and both turned out to be quite a disappointment.the waiter was keen to take a feedback about the food right when we started digging in.the location is nice but for the price and pomp you pay it would be wise to go to a dhaba instead!'), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  Good ambience...............................................................................................................................................'), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  Jashn is a place that I have visited multiple times.
The food tastes well, starters are excellent, main course is good too and the desserts taste really good.
One should be choosy about the items that you order and with not much assistance from the staff.
It has a good ambience being a pool side restaurant but the service is something that's not upto the level of a star hotel."), ('Rated 3.5', 'RATED
  The best masala tandoori chicken I ever had .was staying at the hotel on a work related tour...went to Jashn with a friend because it was too late to go out..but it was a blessing in disguise..had Mutton Rogan Josh and tandoori chicken with naan & bakarkhani..the price were decent..go to place'), ('Rated 3.0', 'RATED
  Attended two days workshop last month. pool side lunch, cake shop and bar has excellent ambiance.
Food I was not happy with it as it had very less varieties in buffet for lunch and taste was not that great.
Coffee, tea, cookies and sandwiches was good I happened to fill stomach with more of these :-)
Staff there were friendly and courteous'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  I had the lobster and I must say it was one of the best I ever had. Perfectly cooked and well served, together with a local white wine it was a great meal. Must try when in Bangalore. Staff gives you a good description of food and helps you choose the best as per your tastes.'), ('Rated 2.0', 'RATED
  Very sad food :(. This sums it up- very dry fish, bad gravy in chicken and just about passable rice. Le Meridien dropped quite a few notches in my mind due to this experience.'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  A very nice place to have poolside food..kebabs taste good.....its worth paying here if you enjoy kebabs in your dine....not only this the staff is good and polite...its the first one for me in bangalore...will always remember it....love it...enjoyed'), ('Rated 3.5', 'RATED
  Had some of the nice pool side dining experience here as inhouse guest.The spread is great and the food is excellent.The chef personally looked after and confirmed the quality is only served.'), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  Nice pool side open air restaurant.Marginally priced as compare to other 5 star hotels in the city. Best kebabs I ever had.Hats off to Chef.'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  Very good food. We once had a pool side party next to it with India vs Pakistan match on a tv. Good experience and tasty good and very good ambience'), ('Rated 3.5', "RATED
  It was the Kebabs and Wine Festival going on in the hotel, and just couldn't stop myself to enjoy this great combo.
Fratelli Wine was the House wine served with a Choice of Mouth watering Kebabs , it had Lamb Sheekh kebab, Murg Malai Kebeb, Shammi Kebab and also had a delicious vegetarian choice of Paneer and Mushroom.
Enjoyed the ambience as the restaurant had a pool side view."), ('Rated 4.5', 'RATED
  Had a chance to visit this restaurant last Sunday.An immaculate venue and a spot to enjoy an event with a friend or family member. Sentimental, delightful, impeccable mix of moods. Blend of a magnificent organization ,food and believe me this spot would never fail to surprise.

Each dish is artfully built with flawless thoughtfulness regarding subtle elements. Unlimited Kababas which worth the cost. Will be visiting again soon. Highly recommended.'), ('Rated 3.5', 'RATED

  This was my 4th visit to this restaurant, and found to be the best place for Kabab. You will get 06 Unlimited Kabab with Main Course and dessert just for Rs.999 ( Veg ) and Rs.1399 (Non Veg), which was an interesting offer this month. A nice rainy evening near to poolside. Overall experience was good, and you will leave the restaurant with high level of satisfaction.'), ('Rated 4.5', 'RATED
  A yet another all time favorite from the Le Meridien Bangalore. Everything about this place is worth the appreciation. The food here is a total killer. reviews_list:
[('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  Visited last week & the atmosphere is hygenic, friendly staff, very polite management.
? Food taste and Service great? really appreciate that, keep the momentum going....?'), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  This is one of the underrated food chains in India. Five Star chicken is a good place to have a quick snack or even a quick meal at pocket friendly rates. Their Chilli Cheese Coins, Burger Combo Meals are worth giving a try!')]

name: White Plate
reviews_list:
[('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  Been there last evening. Staff was friendly and. Ambience is great. There is open dining and lots of fresh air. Good place to for corporate Dineout events..

Food was ok. Breads were good and soft..price is decent. Seems there is change in management and has re-opened recently..'), ('Rated 5.0', "RATED
  They've changed the cuisine to Indian and also reduced the price of each dish by a considerable amount.

The new dishes are surprisingly good.

The butter naans were soft, chicken was cooked well."), ('Rated 3.0', 'RATED
  It's one of the calmer place in Bangalore. Has a nice plush look with live kitchen. The outdoor sitting is as good as the indoor. Also has a good range of music. Now coming on to the main part and that is the "menu", it is a Fine Dine and the food is good. Not exactly a connosuier's delight but good. The ambience of the place is the main lead and the place derives its mojo from there. Overall a good place. A major loophole lies in the entrance which can be a lot better. Overall a good place'), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  Been here for dinner ....
Not so crowded .... You LL find peace and food and some wine together at one place ....
Freshly prepared tikkas were delicious ....
A bit overpriced but ... with Ambience and taste of the food you won't mind paying a bit more"), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  Okay, this place is beautifully and silently located in MG road beside corporation bank.

Ambience is well soothing and romantic.

Being a huge lover of Cosmopolitan, this place I can give 5*** happily, the mixture was perfect prepared. Hats off.

Talking about the food, we ordered chilli chicken which was perfectly balanced with spiciness. Since I'm a major lover of chilli chicken. I enjoyed the food to my core.

  This is a place to definitely if you love to have a Gourmet experience. It's mind-blowing fine dining experience.

Classy Menu with really a humble pricing for the effort and outcome delivered by chefs here.

Staff here are patient and loving. Food is Sumptuous and delicate with it's taste. Ambience is Exceptional.

  Located near the mg road metro station, this place offers good ambiance. The staff here are friendly. The menu looks a bit different than other places... quirky and mashed up with some international cuisines or so they claim. However the food tasted pretty average. The pasta vegetarian dishes were nicely done. However the chicken breast with a cooked banana was a bit over done. The competition for Italian cuisine is at a different level in Bangalore. So I would probably have them work on their pastas a bit more to really be upto that mark. The dessert (thiramisu) wasn't great either but full marks on the presentation. A very quiet and nice place overall."), ('Rated 3.5', 'RATED

  Went to White Plate after going through their Menu in Zomato and reading the reviews. However it fell short of the mark for me. The place was empty, most of the food ( anything with Pork) and Signature cocktails were unavailable. But I would give full marks to Head waiter who put in a lot of effort, directing the bartender to create a cocktail as per my specifications. Whatever food that did get served was good.

We especially like the Lamb Chops, the chops were cooked to perfection with a hint of pink and the knife passed through it like butter. We also had the lobster bisque and lamb broth. Both of them had a lot of flavour, however I would have liked it better if there was some fresh pieces of seafood/meat in it instead of a rubbery roulade

  This place has by far one of the fanciest platings that I have seen. However what lets it down is the slow service and the shoddy cutlery. We started out with hummus and pita bread as we wanted something light to kick off our Sunday lunch. We then ordered prawns wrapped in bacon. For mains we ordered pork chops, chicken sandwich and red snapper. While the dishes tasted good and were immaculately and very aesthetically plated, the quantity left us quite hungry. White plate is not a cheap place. It burns a significant hole through your pocket for pretty food. If you want to impress someone on date night, head out to this place as the outdoor ambiance is quite cozy.'), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  Amazing food and presentation. Veg or non veg all the dishes we tasted were truly worth every penny spent. I will definitely visit this place again to try out more of their dishes.'), ('Rated 1.0', 'RATED

  Ambience 4.5/5
Food 5/5
Service 5/5
Cost 4/5
Been here for sunday brunch. A smal spread but really tasty. I got thr authentic thai taste of food first time ever in bangalore. Food is tasty. Cocktails and mocktails are good too. Highly recommended.'), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  Was here with my wife for our anniversary and it was the perfect choice. Excellent service, a diverse menu that is at once innovative, and yet unpretentious. Desserts are a bit pricey, but totally worth it. Very, very decadent.

The DJ was very perceptive - he noticed that the crowd was generally over 35 this evening, and belted out some amazing retro tracks. Not to suggest that this is the only genre of music played here.

Highly recommended by someone born in Bangalore :)'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  Whenever we are n Bangalore (which is at least twice a year ),we try to explore the newly opened places .This time White Plate caught our eye and we decided on dinner there The Ming dynasty rolls and chilli chicken crunch squares were good and portions were more than enough for two .The dessert was a flash flamed panacotta which looked amazing but was a let down on the taste.The presentation is excellent.Ambience is great. Service is good.All in all a good way to spend a cosy evening.'), ('Rated 1.0', "RATED

  Awesome place, excellent food..
The presentation was done so well to make someone fan of the place.
Visited on a weekday lunch, place was quite empty, staff was too welcoming and perfect in explaining the menu and the dish.
Impressed with the service, food and ambience was also done very well.'), ('Rated 4.5', 'RATED
  A couple of friends and I decided to go after it came highly recommended. The food is delicious. The courses starting with the amuse bouche through dessert did what they set out to do i.e.tantalising our taste buds. The beverage menu is extensive but cocktail options are limited and could do with a fair amount of reinvention and fresh ingredients. Appreciate the full shot of alcohol in the cocktail though! I liked that the quietness with no music meant conversations could be softer and heard. I am sure to visit again as also recommend White Plate.'), ('Rated 4.5', "RATED
  A calm place an beautiful ambiance with herbs greenery an conceptual place now it's my favourite one at mg Road near by so I'll take my buddies an party here ..."), ('Rated 3.5', "RATED
  Pros : loved the seating, loved the kitchen setup. gautham was really good at his service.Really need to appreciate the presentation.
Cons : Never visit , if you are really hungry, food takes it's own time to get out of kitchen. , And food is not all that extraordinary. Really couldn't capture all the flavours. Lobster bisque was good, My charsui pork was really rubbery and tough, which I didn't expect with this kind of restaurant, but gautham was quick replace with another dish. I think management is confused between lounge and fine dine....I think if they concentrate on quality of food and make it a fine dine restaurant then it will be a sure shot hit. Today being Saturday there were quite number of empty tables."), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  A nice place with a lovely ambience, good service and nice food.

We came here for a quite evening dinner and we're not disappointed. The warm ambience and friendly service is evident from the start.

The cocktail menu on Zomato is a bit misleading as most of the elements are not available due to some recent changes in the menu. This put us off slightly.

But the food was good right from the palate cleansers served at the start and the complimentary bread.

We ordered the zimarkhand galouti and the Roesti. Both of which were nice. The Galouti was slightly in the bland side though.

We also ordered their signature Deconstructed black forest, which was a bit disappointing. The dessert was too sweet and lacked a certain balance. A big plus for the plating and presentation though."), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED

  Excellent food and desserts with a pleasant dining ambience !!!! Amazing cocktails by the bar man , the joker cocktail was amazing !!! The chocolate dessert was wow !'), ('Rated 4.5', "RATED
  It's almost like finding a hidden gem on MG road!
It's so non obtrusive and quite unknown even though it's right on MG road.
We went to celebrate a friend's birthday. Place was very quiet and since we were all in the mood for something nice and quiet, it was perfect!
The food was good. A friend was on a diet and the chef happily accommodated his needs to make a wonderful salad. The starters were quite yummy. What took the cake however, was the plating! So novel and interesting. Perhaps that's why it's a part of their identity itself. And The caviar made of all the sauces was so interesting! However, the fact that they did not have just sauce to spread maybe was a downside.
The staff was accommodative and friendly.
It's on the expensive side. But I guess what you're paying for the experience and the ambience and just something new!
It's probably best to go on an occasion, rather than a casual dinner!"), ('Rated 4.5', 'RATED

  It's almost like finding a hidden gem on MG road!
It's so non obtrusive and quite unknown even though it's right on MG road.
We went to celebrate a friend's birthday. Place was very quiet and since we were all in the mood for something nice and quiet, it was perfect!
The food was good. A friend was on a diet and the chef happily accommodated his needs to make a wonderful salad. The starters were quite yummy. What took the cake however, was the plating! So novel and interesting. Perhaps that's why it's a part of their identity itself. And The caviar made of all the sauces was so interesting! However, the fact that they did not have just sauce to spread maybe was a downside.

  To start off with, white plate is located in the heart of the city and has an amazing and chill ambience. This place is the place to go of you ever want to have gourmet food. It is a very classy place and has extremely classy dishes! The presentation of each dish blew my mind! They took the time and patience to set up each dish beautifully. They had custom made caviar for every dish, whether it was an apetizer, or main course and even sweet caviar for the desserts! I would recommend this place to anyone who is a foodie and who would want the complete master chef experience'), ('Rated 3.5', "RATED
  It's a good place but slightly on the expensive side. Ambience was good, so was the presentation. Sandwiches were just OK but celebrity mushrooms were good. Service was good as well"), ('Rated 5.0', "RATED
  White Plate
This is located near lake view, away from all the hussle bussle it's a silent place so apt for perfect date night. The food is amazing just gives the master chef feels, it tastes as good it looks.
We ordered chilli crunch squares this was chicken it was really tender and nice. Coming to the mains we ordered exotic vegetable sqrudel and pan seared breast chicken both were really delicious. We were satisfied with the quantity as well.
Its was dad's birthday so we had carried a pastry if not we were tempted to taste the desserts too! They had just began with liquor after all the ban and mess , so it just got perfect.
Will surly go again in love with the ambience and the food"), ('Rated 4.5', "RATED
  A nice spacious fine dine place..
Food- 5/5
Presentation- 5/5
Service- 5/5
The only disappointing part was the drinks (mocktails and cocktails) weren't available as they have just opened..but a fresh new entry in the fine dine category!"), ('Rated 3.5', "RATED
  Great ambience ( they really need to do something about the mosquitoes ), good food and great service.

This is your master chef kinda food where there is a spin on everything served.

The appetizer we're good water chestnuts and broccoli in schewan chilli sauce was awesome. The chestnuts we're were fresh and crunchy.

The soups are big and filling. The mains are really large portions and tough to finish.

The main Chinese veggies sandwich was good but a little too salty for my liking.

The cavier of different accompaniments are good but lacked the punch it's expected to deliver.

The dessert was really great and we'll balanced.

They served kinley bottled water priced at MRP.20 and charged 110 + 10 % service charge ... Not happy about this.

Overall a good experience."), ('Rated 4.5', 'RATED

  White Place has truly outdone itself in terms of fine dinning. Very few restaurants focus so much on every little detail of a dish, and White Plate being one of them has set definitely set the bench mark for this. I was highly impressed with the thought, effort and presentation for every dish as they were all so different but at the same time very unique and highly elevated. I feel like White Plate has combined food and "food art" together very well. I strongly recommend anyone visiting to try the Lobster Risotto, it was beyond amazing and the Hummus with Pita Bread. The bacon wrapped prawns were excellent too, and for dessert I'd definitely settle for the Tiramisu as every bite felt like heaven. I'm definitely going to go back and try out some other dishes that i'm sure i'd love as much as the rest. The service was excellent, very attentive staff. The place itself is beautiful with a lovely and classy atmosphere.'), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED

  The 1st ever restaurant to be rated 5/5, the best fine dine experience in a long time.
The ambience was great but management was excellent.

The food was amazing, attention to detail was great.
Asparagus soup = excellent
Hummus pita = excellent
Mushroom dish had balsamic caviar , mint caviar and was stunning.

Loved the food, the presentation . Unfortunately they don't serve alcohol due the government highway proximity law's, but you won't miss it here, the food does it all."), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  This place is so hidden from the hustle bustle on MG road...which works both in favour and against this restaurant.

  Undoubtedly one of the new best restaurant in town with its unique molecular gastronomy cuisine. The ambience and service is top notch. Definitely worth a visit. The De-constructed black Forrest raspberry and Cassis Blueberry is to die for.'), ('Rated 4.5', 'RATED
  I would HIGHLY recommend White Plate to anyone who enjoys food with a little twist. The menu is very exciting and the food is very well prepared. We'd ordered the scallops (Yummm!!!!!), the cherry wood smoked zimikhand galouti (nice kebab, tough parantha) and the smoked salmon (it came with a bitter gourd salad that was delicious!!!). For dessert, the cassis blueberry, which the server described as "not all desserts need to be sweet". Excellent food!
The ambience is great as well, and the service was very good.'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  Awesome ambience. Tucked behind a heritage structure next to Joy Aluka on MG Road, this place is must try on a windy day.   What a fabulous culinary experience we had at this newly opened restaurant a few days ago! For starters we had the falafal, the celebrity shrooms and the watermelon, pine nuts and feta crumble all of which were unique, original and absolutely delicious! For the main course we had Norwegian salmon which was innovatively paired with bitter gourd(!), an absolute winner. The ratatouille, linguini pasta and tagliatelle chicken pasta were great too :) The plating especially deserves special mention..extremely creative and artistic! For desert we had the reconstructed black forest and as the chef rightly says "we'll never have black forest anywhere else"! Definitely coming back for seconds!'), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  What a fabulous culinary experience we had at this newly opened restaurant a few days ago! For desert we had the reconstructed black forest and as the chef rightly says "we'll never have black forest anywhere else"! Definitely coming back for seconds!'), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  Friends and I went to The White Plate last night andi was very pleasantly surprised. Nice no fuss decor and the food was very good . Plating was excellent , flavours good and the menu is very interesting.
I'm definitely going back to try some more! The black forest dessert deserves a special mention...it was a delightful end to the meal. The service was very good too but I have to say the restaurant was not even half full so I don't know how it will be on a full night. Good luck to chef Jason and his team!"), ('Rated 5.0', "RATED
  Amazing place..
Located at the most happening place in banglore..it's got everything your taste for a little fancy food..
Fine dining at its best!!
Chef Jason is amazing..
Pan seared breast of chicken is highly recommended."), ('Rated 4.5', "RATED
  Chef Jason take a bow! For you have truly brought an extraordinary dining experience to Bangalore. Right from the ambience (classy, understated and simple) to the service and the food - not an element was out of sync. The staff are warm and treat you like a guest they were expecting at their own home for a meal. The food is a work of art - beautifully plated, exquisite tasting - it transported us to culinary heaven right away! Chef Jason has played with unique flavour pairings such as the use of fresh dill in the blueberry cassis dessert and raspberry gel with pork spare ribs. The Tasmanian Salmon and Red Snapper were fresh and juicy and even though they look like small portions, it is super filling. Don't miss the blueberry cassis & reconstructed Black Forest dessert - it's unlike anything you have eaten or seen before. If you're looking for a fabulous dining experience, White Plate is the place to go!!"), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED

  Insanely amazing! Phenomenal food and faultless service. Hands down the best restaurant in town. Go here if u want a stunning meal that'll blow your mind.

We ordered the salmon, lamb chops, mushroom quiche and they were all really great. The dessert was also superb.

The service and personal touches by the staff and Jason himself was what also sets this place apart. I can't wait to go back and try the other stuff"), ('Rated 4.5', "RATED
  A gastronomic treat!!! It's simply amazing. Chef Jason has really brought world class food to our plates. Thank u Chef.
Every dish we ordered just to name a few;the Celebrity shrooms to the smoked salmon n the deconstructed Black Forest was just amazing. It's a treat to the eyes. Each bite of the food was like dance on my tongue.
The only reason I held back on the .5 was I felt that the place mats n tissues could be better to make it a fine dining experience.
I have never tasted such awesome food. A treat to the eyes and an awakening of my taste buds.
Keep up the awesome work!!!"), ('Rated 5.0', "RATED

  We had an amazing time. The place was so chilled out, the food absolutely spectacular.Our waiter was just wonderful. Looking forward to visiting your place again Chef Jason and Team to check out all the other fabulous and mouth watering dishes on your menu. What a great place and outstanding food! Wishing you all the very best, guys.'), ('Rated 4.5', "RATED
  I had come across White Plate a couple of days earlier, and few friends and I decided to drop by to celebrate a special occasion. I was personally a huge fan of the Honeysuckle smoked duck breast, which melted in your mouth with nearly every bite. The quinoa accompanying the dish was a bit of a let down though. Apart from this, the pulled pork and cassis blueberry were excellent. The staff were extremely warm and accommodating, and Chef Jason made it a point to make a personal appearance at each table to explain the dish being served.  Overall, it was an absolutely delightful experience, and one that I'm more than willing to try again."), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  Loved it! The ambience, the food and the chef!  What an effort he and the team puts in to ensure customers go back with an experience. From starters to desserts every plate has that extra touch to make sure you will be thinking about it for days to come. A must try is the watermelon, feta cheese and pine nut salad! Not to forget the deconstructed black forest. Chef Jason rightly said, i will never eat a black forrest anywhere else... Best of luck to you team White Plate!'), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED

  Was in Bangalore for work and came across this new restaurant on Zomato. White plate by Chef Jason. We were famished and strained on time so we jumped right to the main course. Presentation of dishes is like a Michelin star restaurant...you feel like you are in Masterchef ( for all Masterchef fans out there this a must visit place)
1. Corn Fed Hen: Grilled chicken with a twist. Delicious
2.Pan seared Chicken breast: absolutely time and delish

Desserts we had the blueberry dessert as per the staff's recommendation. Content satisfied and happy .

Price wise: affordable and easy on pocket
Staff: 5/5
Ambience 4/5
Food 4/5

At the end u want to say we both had licked our plates off hence "white plates" ( pun intended) ;)'), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  The food, ambience and the staff were extraordinary and cannot be faulted with. This place is an experience on the whole and i strongly recommend this restaurant.'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  A great new place tucked away on MG Road. The ambiance is inviting and the menu is a page turner! Great continental food with a dash of Indian flavours plated up like works of art. Great a visual experience as much as it was a gastronomical one. Absolutely loved the Crunch Chicken and crusted lamb for starters and the Salmon for mains. And oh the pesto roseti! Yum and gorgeous. Great staff, and service. Much luck to Chef Jason and the team.'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  We had the salmon for main course and it was really good. The sandwich with potato roesti in an English muffin was also pretty good.

However the dessert with blueberry cassis was the star of the show and ranks amongst the best dessert we have had in Bangalore.

The chef, Jason is clearly passionate about the food he makes, highly trained and talented. We wish him the very best and hope White Plate is the success it deserves to be.'), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED

Great staff, and service. Much luck to Chef Jason and the team.'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  We had the salmon for main course and it was really good. The sandwich with potato roesti in an English muffin was also pretty good.

However the dessert with blueberry cassis was the star of the show and ranks amongst the best dessert we have had in Bangalore.

The chef, Jason is clearly passionate about the food he makes, highly trained and talented. We wish him the very best and hope White Plate is the success it deserves to be.'), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  Was in Bangalore for work and came across this new restaurant on Zomato. White plate by Chef Jason. We were famished and strained on time so we jumped right to the main course. Presentation of dishes is like a Michelin star restaurant...you feel like you are in Masterchef ( for all Masterchef fans out there this a must visit place)
1. Corn Fed Hen: Grilled chicken with a twist. Delicious
2.Pan seared Chicken breast: absolutely time and delish

Desserts we had the blueberry dessert as per the staff's recommendation. Content satisfied and happy .

Price wise: affordable and easy on pocket
Staff: 5/5
Ambience 4/5
Food 4/5

At the end u want to say we both had licked our plates off hence "white plates" ( pun intended) ;)'), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  The food, ambience and the staff were extraordinary and cannot be faulted with. This place is an experience on the whole and i strongly recommend this restaurant.'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  A great new place tucked away on MG Road. The ambiance is inviting and the menu is a page turner! Great continental food with a dash of Indian flavours plated up like works of art. Great a visual experience as much as it was a gastronomical one. Absolutely loved the Crunch Chicken and crusted lamb for starters and the Salmon for mains. And oh the pesto roseti! Yum and gorgeous. Great staff, and service. Much luck to Chef Jason and the team.'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  We had the salmon for main course and it was really good. The sandwich with potato roesti in an English muffin was also pretty good.

However the dessert with blueberry cassis was the star of the show and ranks amongst the best dessert we have had in Bangalore.

The chef, Jason is clearly passionate about the food he makes, highly trained and talented. We wish him the very best and hope White Plate is the success it deserves to be.'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  Great food. Good service. Committed owner who stood behind the bar as a makeshift bartender when times were busy. Kudos.

Ambience could use some work.')]

name: Buff Buffet Buff
cuisines: North Indian, Chinese, Continental, Thai, Salad
reviews_list:
[('Rated 5.0', "RATED
  Buff buffet buff they stand as per their name when come to food and service. A very good dining experience at this restaurant, we were bored of the BBQ grills and went in for normal buffet but surprisingly the service and food was so good that it was far better than then normal BBQ grills now coming down to rating it's a 5* star in all the aspects. Pics would discribe this place better."), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  DonÃ\x83Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x92t we all want to wake up at 10 AM on a Sunday and just have a feast of a brunch which has a little bit of north, a little bit of south and awesomeness all around? Buff Buffet Buff is one such place where the craving of every hunger panda will be taken care of. I mean the place has Ã\x83Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x91BuffetÃ\x83Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x92 in its name Ã\x83Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x96 isnÃ\x83Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x92t it obvious? Well, okay I agree Ã\x83Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x96 it is very obvious BUT you are going to be surprised by the crazy choice of food and cuisine they offer in their buffet. This isnÃ\x83Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x92t the ordinary buffet where you come with a set mind of palate and cuisine to try Ã\x83Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x96 because I can bet that if you are on a diet will be thrown out of the window once you enter this place! Buffet? yes, please! ...
Read full post on eattherapy.com'), ('Rated 3.0', 'RATED
  I gave 3 stars because of the ambience, it can be an area of improvement. The starters are good, one has plenty of options there. The main course also has good options, presentation is really good when it comes to the salads and side dishes. Not many options in desserts. I would say its a good place to go out with your family, not with your date.'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  Alright if you can stuff yourself like a hungry wolf, this is the place for you. The grills were all amazing, juicy and deliciously lip smacking. Special mention goes to the grilled fish, its just divine. The staff is very polite, courteous and the prices are reasonable.

Mark my words friends, this place is the best when it comes to Buffet.'), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  Wide spread buffet with good service . Friendly staff and courteous staff. The spread is dam good. This had been our 6th visit to this place . Sabita and Santosh good service guys . Thank you'), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  Kind polite and good waiting by SantoshKumar and savitga. Great food, great ambience. Range of varieties for starters and even for main course.'), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  There were 10 varieties of starters for both Veg and Non-Veg and Mongolian Cuisine Live Counter. Drinks weren't so good. Overall it was a good experience."), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  Happy new year guys!! Hope u have a wonderful year ahead...?
Coming to my gastronomical affair new year had to be special.. heading out for good brunch with family is best remedy for hangovers...?
Alright it's in prime location so parking is issue but they have parking space so I don't have to worried about.
Ambience-well we went on 1st January so it's too crowded so there was no much time to analyse the decor.but was pretty decent.
Food- this is what we pay for, they had special lunch. The live counter was amazing, waffles,does, dim sum quite lots of options.
Tom yum soup was tasty, starters, salads,main course was pretty decent. But they had Less options for desert if u r someone who save space for desert you might get disappointed.
Overall it was pretty good..."), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  This place was in my bookmarks since a long time, so decided to give a try for our team dinner and I must say it wasnÃ\x83Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x92t a wrong choice. They have a quite big place to accommodate a good number of people. Staffs are very polite and helpful and service is also quick. They serve a good number of veg and non veg starters which were very yumm. Everything tasted superb. Non veg Main Course had quite many options and good in taste. Chicken Hyderabadi was too good. I didnÃ\x83Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x92t try Veg but my teammates told they were also equally good. They have a live kitchen but no one of us could try because of being overloaded by the starters. In Desert they have moderate options but I tasted only Jamun and Ice Cream. Vanilla and butterscotch flavours were good. Now coming to the Mocktails, we did try a few and they also didnÃ\x83Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x92t disappoint us. Overall a good place for family as well as office parties and guys, their starters are must try.'), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  A nice place for buffet craving. If you are around Koramangala, a must visit place. Ambience is classy and music was soothing our mind.

Coming to the food, they have a wide option of items on the buffet. 10 veg and 10 non veg starters served on the table. Liked Prawn in lemon chilli sauce, fish rawa fry and Kalmi kebab. Also all veg starters were superb. I tried main course in most buffet places, but this one some thing amazing. Quality and variety of the items were superb. Liked mutton masala the most along with tandoori roti. Veg main course was also good.

The only dissapoint was the dessert spread. They can add more varieties like starters and main course.

Service was courteous and friendly. We really enjoyed our time.

I will highly recommend this place. ??'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  Had been her for a mid week buffet.. good variety of food both veg and non veg all tasting very good ?? good hospitality courteous staff... recomended place for buffet..'), ('Rated 5.0', "RATED
  Buff Buffet Buff- as the name suggests, it's a nice place where you can enjoy buffet and live dishes with your friends and family.

The ambiance of the restaurant was good and so was the food. This was my second visit and the staff members made sure in every way to keep our evening delightful. They were very courteous and well mannered.

Moreover, they also presented us with special desserts and drinks which was really praiseworthy.

A MUST TRY!

Food- 4. 5/5
Ambience- 4/5
Service- 4.5/5

Overall- 4.5/5

If you want to have unlimited good quality food served hot in your plates, Buff Buffet Buff won't fail to impress you."), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  Nice place for get together with family and friends or for small office lunch and dinner. Good was good and service was nice. Recommended place for having dinner with loved one.
Priya Singh served us and it was really good.'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  Perfect place for the Sunday lunch!!!
I thoroughly enjoyed this place and literally I feel I have gained double the weight!
Service was too good!!
Each and every dish was just awesome!
Desserts were yummy!!!
Starters were too good!

YFM
Food:4/5
Ambience:4/5
Service:5/5
Quality:4/5'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  I saw this place when I was in Buff Buffet Buff fast time and since then it was in my which list for a long time... Visited for the weekend lunch.....'), ('Rated 2.0', "RATED
  It's a nice place for a weekend. Delicious food, prompt service. Good ambience. Good value for money. Loved Maa ki dua paratha. Wonderful place for a get together. Would like to visit again"), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  A refreshingly simple buffet place with great choices in the menu and very courteous staff. Food is very tasty. I've had the tastiest Chicken and Mushroom soup here. Their prawn and fish offerings are also too good. Just that their dessert selection could improve in terms of variety."), ('Rated 3.0', 'RATED
  Lots of options in starter but evrything is so bland, tasteless. No taste at all. And same as main course too. I like only cheese cake there in dessert nothing else. If taste is not good what is the point of options. I do not think I will hit this again.'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED

  Most polite and courteous staff i hv ever met. Made me and my family, friends feel very comfortable. Gave a table of our choice. Food was awesome. Dinner buffet was for 750 rs, value for money.'), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  Went there for a Team Dinner!The ambience is good for Family dinners as well as Team dinners.Food is really good here, but there is a limited variety.'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  I have visited recently with my freinds to this place, really they offer a best combinations of veg and nonveg starters ,main course a elaborate buffet the food was aboslutley fresh and tasteyenjoyed a lot , specially perfect ambeince takes you out of this world ,
Over all a good experience
Looking forward to visited again'), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  A nice warm ambience, and a good service. Let's talk food.

Starters need big time improvement, specially non veg and sea food. The chicken got hard in most starters. I had reordered it and then it was fine. Main course chicken was also hard/stiff. Veg food was good. Paneer lababdar and Dal makhani were good. Mongolian barbecue section was good.

The deserts were very good."), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  BBB for the perfect breakfast to start your day. Good amount of options, and the food prepared with perfection. Ambience not on the high scale. Lunch though pulls more cash from your pocket, is good for starters and desert lovers. If you want to have a value for money food, prefer this place for Breakfast.'), ('Rated 3.0', "RATED
  It's 3.5 Actually!
U can easily find this place.. It serves some awesome ranges of mouth watering delicacies in their buffet menu.. From starters to Desserts there's a looooooooooooot of options available! So, if you want to hit this place go there starving.. ?
Overall Ambience was good.. Service was also good..
food taste may be improved in some cases... and some improvement is much needed in terms of hygiene!!
1. Dessert Cups must be Replaced...
2. I found hair in one of their dishes..."), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  I saw this place when I was in koramangala last time and since then it was in my wish list for a long time..visited for the weekend lunch and guess what we reached quite early :P

The starters will just blow your mind..there were 10 veg & non-veg starters which were equally amazing..main course were just pretty normal..there was a live counter toooo which served us the customised foood items..?

Coming to desserts, it was like icing on the cake..everything was just delicious..couldn't try their ice creams since we were already full?

And a special appreciation goes to the staff!
Great hospitality..staff were so polite and they took good care of us?"), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  MD tokir the service was really good and again one more .. Priya these two guys .. were served very well ... and they took us food whatever I like...'), ('Rated 2.0', "RATED
  After looking at the reviews and hearing about its extensive buffet menu, I chose to visit this place for breakfast with family. However, the visit wasn't a pleasant one.
1. The breakfast items unlike other restaurants was extremely limited.
2. Most of the things were cold
3. We ordered for dosa which tasted weird - I guess the batter was left out from previous day.
4. In the name of fruits they had just banana and muskmelon and the muskmelon was unriped!
5. It took then more than half hour to serve boiled eggs.
6. There were barely 8 people in the entire restaurant but the bread basket was empty.
7. We ordered for an aloo paratha but it was not stuffed and cooked well.
8. The waffle was hard and tasteless.

The only good thing was that the place was quiet so I could eat breakfast in peace. Very bad experience otherwise."), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED

  After looking at the reviews and hearing about its extensive buffet menu, I chose to visit this place for breakfast with family. However, the visit wasn't a pleasant one.
1. The breakfast items unlike other restaurants was extremely limited.
2. Most of the things were cold
3. We ordered for dosa which tasted weird - I guess the batter was left out from previous day.
4. In the name of fruits they had just banana and muskmelon and the muskmelon was unriped!
5. It took then more than half hour to serve boiled eggs.
6. There were barely 8 people in the entire restaurant but the bread basket was empty.
7. We ordered for an aloo paratha but it was not stuffed and cooked well.
8. The waffle was hard and tasteless.

The only good thing was that the place was quiet so I could eat breakfast in peace. Very bad experience otherwise."), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED

The starters will just blow your mind..there were 10 veg & non-veg starters which were equally amazing..main course were just pretty normal..there was a live counter toooo which served us the customised foood items..?

Coming to desserts, it was like icing on the cake..everything was just delicious..couldn't try their ice creams since we were already full?

And a special appreciation goes to the staff!
Great hospitality..staff were so polite and they took good care of us?"), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  MD tokir the service was really good and again one more .. Priya these two guys .. were served very well ... and they took us food whatever I like...'), ('Rated 2.0', "RATED
  After looking at the reviews and hearing about its extensive buffet menu, I chose to visit this place for breakfast with family. However, the visit wasn't a pleasant one.
1. The breakfast items unlike other restaurants was extremely limited.
2. Most of the things were cold
3. We ordered for dosa which tasted weird - I guess the batter was left out from previous day.
4. In the name of fruits they had just banana and muskmelon and the muskmelon was unriped!
5. It took then more than half hour to serve boiled eggs.
6. There were barely 8 people in the entire restaurant but the bread basket was empty.
7. We ordered for an aloo paratha but it was not stuffed and cooked well.
8. The waffle was hard and tasteless.

The only good thing was that the place was quiet so I could eat breakfast in peace. Very bad experience otherwise."), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED

  Worth every penny u spent. Tried buffet and was tired of eating. Such was the quality of starters that there wasn't any room left for main course.

  So I booked a table and reached on time but to my surprise I received table after 20min ....
