  The food was excellent and the shakes were amazing. The burgers were nice and chicken was also fresh. The price might be a bit on the higher side.'), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  Impressive!

Never been a fan of buffets, but this place changed my opinion. Quality, Spread and Price- everything perfect.

Loved veg momos and the mushroom starter. 4 options of rice and great options in desserts.

They had both global and local options making it a perfect meal.

Corporate offer on 14+ ppl. Recommended for team lunches!'), ('Rated 5.0', "RATED
  I am a frequent visitor to this place, it's on the ground floor of the hotel and is nicely located in Koramangala.
The food is good, but what will actually make your day would be the courteous staff who will ensure ur taste buds get what you prefer.
Good place for friends get together or a corporate team dinner"), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  Buff Buffet Buff is probably one of the best buffet spot in Koramangala. The rates are decent and the list of aliments are endless. A dozen starters which was very relishing, moreish main course, delicious desserts. The ambience is great too. Best place to be for a satisfactory buffet.

Ambience - 8/10
Food - 9/10
Variety - 9/10
Desserts - 8/10
Staff - 9/10
Value for money - 9.5/10
A very nice place to hangout with friends. Must Try!! ????')]

name: The Trundle
reviews_list:
[('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  The best restaurant around jayanagar for perfect blend multi cuisine.
They have wide range of food options and recently they have upgraded their menu.
Love their presentation and the yummy flavors. The only thing that this place misses out is on Tom kha but never mind they have other things to focus on.
Ã\x83Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x93Dum murghÃ\x83Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x94 - cheesy chicken served in matka is a must try.

Food - 4.5/5
Ambience - 4.5/5
Value for money - 4/5'), ('Rated 3.5', 'RATED
  A good looking ambience. Rooftop is really good and a chill out place to hang out with friends.
Food is decent, not very great though.
Service is pretty fast.
Overall an okay experience.')]

name: Kargeens
reviews_list:
[('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  A very cool place for group of friends who wants to hangout and just chill.
Amazing staff. A very decent food menu.
A great hukkah cafe I must say, wonderfully breezy.
I would completely recommend this place for a laid back Sunday evening with friends after Fridays or Saturdays party buzz.'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  Nice place for hookah lovers. Food was also good. I ordered Manchow soup, fried fish, kargress coffer and pass rasna hookah. All was awesome.'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  Nice place for hookah and some side snacks! The place is not too funky, but itÃ\x83Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x83Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82ÃÂ¢Ã\x83Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x80Ã\x83Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x99s not expensive at all! If somebody is out of budget end of the month and want to catch up with friends, I think this is a go to place when pocket is almost empty Ã\x83Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x83Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82ÃÂ°Ã\x83Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x9fÃ\x83Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x98Ã\x83Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x89'), ('Rated 3.0', 'RATED
  Cafe is good

But hukka is ok

Maggi was taste less

Masala maggi 2.5/5
Hukka 3/5
Black coffie. 4/5

Staff service. 4/5

Thank you guys for your service'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  Its an old style cafe with buzzing crowd and music. They have swings where you can relax and enjoy your hookah. The food is good. Ordered chicken soup, stroganoff and kargeen special chicken. They were all delicious. The staff is very helpful and friendly. They are always watching your table in case you need anything.'), ('Rated 3.0', "RATED
  Too much air on the Terrace to have hookah honestly but the staff tries their level best. Food is cool. Start keeping Ginger ale, that's my go to drink."), ('Rated 5.0', "RATED
  Best place for the hookah with some quick bite with alot fun .And best environment in the roof top .And beautiful Ambience .Gud staff and we'll all is abt the food and hookah with nice music and grt service ..keep up the gud job ... Spl thx to the staff"), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  Went to this place few years back, chilled out place wid hookah nd many other games, ambience was good, staff behaviour was polite.Again we are planing to come. :)'), ('Rated 3.0', 'RATED
  Best for: A Group of friends.
Ambiance: Casual, swings and low couches. Half of the space is open terrace as well which is good.
Food: Just ok. I usually go there for hukka. Which is good. For food, I found it just ok.
Must Try: HUKKA
Service: Fine
Location: Prime, with valet parking.
Overall: Good place to hang out with friends and groups to love the time spent.'), ('Rated 2.0', 'RATED
  One of the worst places i have been to, service is slow, food is also okish. Plus you have to wait a lot to get your food. Two stars are just for being a good rooftop cafe for hookah.'), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  We went for a group treat at Kargeens, overall the experience was nice, the staff were friendly and the menu they have is quite large. It's a hookah place and hence all you hookah lovers will live this place. As far as the quality of food was concerned, some of the items were good while others were bad. The ambiance can be improved, the lighting was not great. Overall 4/5 .")]

name: A.M New Punjab Food Corner
reviews_list:
[('Rated 1.0', "RATED
  Ordered chicken fried rice and dumped it into dustbin.Poor quality rice and no taste at all.
I don't know why zomato partner with such restaurant?"), ('Rated 1.0', 'RATED
  gave wrong orders'), ('Rated 1.0', 'RATED
  I ordered baingan curry but they sent carrot curry'), ('Rated 2.0', 'RATED
  tandoori roti is not good'), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  Very homely food....loved the garlic mushroom and dal fry'), ('Rated 3.0', 'RATED
  chicken bharta was just average in taste not WOW... breads were good....'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  good'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  Good food'), ('Rated 1.0', 'RATED
  not good quantity'), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  A very good budget and tasty restaurant in Koramangala area. Try Gobi paratha, all roti items, Mushroom masala, paneer butter masala. Taste is very nice.'), ('Rated 4.5', 'RATED
  I came across this new food joint while I was looking for a house and while I was very hungry, I was able to get the entire menu at 11 PM in the night. The place has expanded in terms of their seating as crowd followed their sumptuous lunch and dinner menu. The owner saw this as an opportunity to attract more crowd by serving affordable Tandoor thus bringing you the real taste of Punjab in this concentrated south indian gully. While it does not appear to be very quaint in decor, the servers really give you a warm feeling from the starters too the cheque. Walk in to AM Punjab Corner and fill yourself keeping your austerity intact.')]

name: Cafe On The Way
reviews_list:
[('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  This is a small Cafe located on koramangala. They have outdoor seating. It's very peaceful. A place where you can go have coffee and spend time reading a book for hours.

Ordered Cafe latte, Alfredo pasta and waffles. The dishes were good in taste and well made.

The service here is quite slow and definitely needs improvement. The food is good and ambience is soothing.")]

name: Earth Plate Express
reviews_list:
[('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  Well Earth Plate Express is a place to have Sizzlers and Pasta...??
They do serves good quantity with fabulous taste in their dishes...
Well I ordered Manchurian Sizzler. It was perfect in taste with very well quantity..?
I just loved it.
They do have lots option in pasta too...?
I.ll visit again to have pastas???')]

name: Radha Rani
reviews_list:
[('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  One of my favourite bengali food joint. Been there for several times never disappointed.not only bengali food it masters in Chinese & mughlai food as well.Budget friendly & tasty.'), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  One of the best home delivery meals I had ever had. I had ordered for a fish meal. And there was rice.. fish curry.. Matar curry.. Mix veg and papad.its with salad. The taste was absolutely homemade and less oily. Good quantity at affordable price. Great job guys'), ('Rated 3.0', "RATED
  Ordered food online from their place. Haven't actually been to the place so can't comment on ambience.
Coming to the food, I feel all their preparation is a wee bit to spicy. Be it dry or a gravy preparation, spices won't be kept to a moderation. So its a heaven for all the spicy food lovers.

Their thali combos are priced really competitively for a place like bangalore. Although I feel the chicken main course items is priced a bit high as compared to what it offers; I was a bit astonished to see 5 small pieces of chicken with bone in my order, which was no where near enough to suffice for a plate of rice/roti. The noodles are tasty though; not much different from other places cooking Chinese, but a great steal for the price.

Just hope they will improve their packaging in the near future."), ('Rated 3.0', "RATED
  From this restaurant I had ordered a mushroom masala plate. Taste quality was normal not very taste. I hadn't tried here anything .
So this review on the basis of one food order."), ('Rated 3.0', "RATED
  This place comes handy when it's the month end and one is tight on the pocket. This is a very affordable food option for the bongs and serves home style bengali food. I specially prefer their thali on weekends since they give aloo Posto on weekends and they make really tasty Posto. Their fried chicken is really good as well as their chicken noodles.
A good food option in case of hunger pangs...")]

  Long time back, I am speaking about 2007-8, it was a coveted destination for bachelors and shoe string budget fellas. Once in a fortnight, a tandoor chicken from here was a must. It was so spicy and delicious... But the quality has taken a hit, I would have easily rated this 4 considering that quality and price. At current quality its okeish restaurant. Price decent still. Its a nostalgic place to visit, being a place where we used to regularly head for our treats since 2000. Have seen the guy at counter grow up from a kid who used to sit with his father to a man who manages the counter.

Food is ok. Queue has become lesser because of drop in quality and their head cook moved to Magix Roll( That's where I saw him last).,But yes the prompt service and student crowd, visiting it after so long was more of emotional pull."), ('Rated 2.0', 'RATED
  Food quality is good and price is reasonable. Ambience is OK OK type according to this range. Service is pathetic here. I ordered for one naan they have 2 butter naans. I asked chilly paneer without gravy. They have given with gravy. Though the food is good service is not.'), ('Rated 3.0', 'RATED
  The only thing I go to eat in Tandoor Garden is Chicken Roll. They wrap chicken in Rumali Roti which makes it different from all the other places. Delicious and very cheap too..'), ('Rated 3.0', 'RATED
  A very casual place but a spacious one. The food served here is ordinary, nothing special! Ambience is good. Food quality and quantity are both satisfactory. Basically a place for casual dinner or lunch. Few improvements can make wonders!'), ('Rated 3.0', 'RATED
  This was one of my go to place in BTM but with the improvements happening in the area like BTM this place has not improved a bit in last 5 years. Ambience is awful and so is the service but still there are a few things which make me visit this place, few of them are chicken roll served in rumali roti, special tandoori kabab, chilli chicken etc. Try them ;)'), ('Rated 3.0', 'RATED
  Tandoor Garden is one of the best place to have Mughal Style and Tandoori Dishes in BTM Layout. Well known for the bachelors who stays in this location.
My first visit was based on one of my friends suggestion.
Veg Dishes are very less here compare non veg dishes but I find it decent enough with some starters and main course.
This is a good pocket friendly restaurant compare to other restaurants in BTM.
Disadvantage is parking here, as the restaurant is located in Main Road.
Service is really quick and friendly staff.
Overall:
Quality: 3/5
Taste: 3/5
Service: 3/5
VFM: 3.5/5

bangaloreepicure.com'), ('Rated 4.5', 'RATED
  I was waiting from many days to write some good about this place as I cannot remember how many Saturday or Sunday we have spent here with friend to have in the dinners. If you are a rich kid and you spend a lot for good food, decoration and service every time you go out in the week end then this is not your place but if you are looking for some good amount of food with not so bad test, service and in a very reasonable price then this is the place for you.

There are not more than 10 veg and 10 none veg curry they have in there menu which all tests same and which we all have tested. But place has less crowdie and you will not have to wait too long to get the food in the table. If you are really hungry after a week full of work and looking for a place where you can relax and have plate full of food, you should visit this place.'), ('Rated 1.0', 'RATED
  We tried Panner Butter Masala. It was sweet curry.

I think its enough reason not to try the restaurant.'), ('Rated 4.5', 'RATED
  A good place to dine out with friends!!!! n one of the oldest resturant in btm'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  Good food at affordable price. Ambience needs some work.')]

name: Dal Roti
reviews_list:
[('Rated 3.0', 'RATED
  Home cooked food. but the thali is very heavy with loads of ghee. taste is ok. the phulkas are soft and loaded with ghee. after eating gulab jamun which was very sweet felt very heavy.if you take thali make sure you are very hungry.'), ('Rated 1.5', "RATED
  Utter nonsense place.... Menu is very exciting and cost effective but quantity and taste is not good. Single piece of guluab jamun is 25rupees which is totally crazy???? for a typical north Indian mess. Unfortunately they don't serve u extra dhal for the thali...and they give u two small cups of dhal which is technically not possible to finish the v rice and roti that they give in thali"), ('Rated 3.0', "RATED
  You enter a huge hall that looks like a space in a haveli with ample seating. I ordered a Dal roti full thali that consisted of rotis, one gravy subji which was chole and one dry subji which was cabbage, Rice, Raita and Salad. Perfectly cooked with homely flavors. Im sure you'd feel full and satisfied. I suggest they dont charge extra for a little bit of extra subji or dal. People have different ways of eating. I wont say its reasonable unless it was unlimited but yes i would definitely recommend it for the taste. Very homely and very tasty."), ('Rated 2.0', 'RATED
  Food is not tasty your food is vary spicy'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED

  I'm a regular here as it's very close to my office. It's definitely a healthy option considering all the other places in the vicinity.

  Although i have never been to this hotel in person, but i ordered for home delivery quite often and i must mention that the taste is very good.   I have been to Dal roti at least 15 times and not once i was disappointed with the place.
Dont judge the book by its cover...Y? Coz.....
Ambiance is very simple and basic.
Service is very good and quick.
Food is the talk of the place. They make the best Aloo Paratha and Phulkas. Alone with these dishes, i love Rajma Masala and yummy buttermilk, Gulab Jamoon is worth the taste. The meals are also pretty good, both quality and quantity wise.
Affordable prices for such good food.
So if you have not gone to Dal Roti please try and if you have been there and didn't have a good experience, go again and try the dishes i mentioned you will not regret.
Go with simple thought of having good hot food not worrying too much about ambiance and how the servers look."), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  It's one of my favorite places to eat north Indian food with a home cooked flavour. Not a biggie on ambience and cleanliness but personally I feel the taste compromises for it. Pricing is decent and portions are decent. Must try once!"), ('Rated 3.5', 'RATED

  First of all the pricing is very very reasonable. Second of all, tastes almost like home made. Third of all, 'what are you still waiting for? Order some food already'.."), ('Rated 1.0', 'RATED
  Went there sat night around 10pm

POPULARITY INDEX
Almost empty whike the neighboring restaurants were very busy

AMBIENCE
Clean confortable no frills dhaba airy

FOOD
Asked the waiter what veg was in the thali. He said rajma and aloo. A total no no for me. I like fresh flavorful healthy food. Aloo is classified as a tumor not a veg its boring unhealthy and lacks the freshness and flavor of other veg. For rs 80 they can surely provide better

OVERALL IF YOU WANT A GOOD NORTH INDIAN THALI JUST DO A BIT OF TRAVEL TO BTM. LOTS IF CHOICES BETTER QUALITY AT ALMOST HALF THE PRICE'), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  Nice hole in the wall place. It's more of a small eatery where you eat and move on. Not a hangout as such :-) We had the mini thali - 4 rotis, dal, sabzi. Rotis were very soft. Dal tasted very good as well.

  If you are fed up of eating non veg or rich and spicy food, then this is a place worth trying.
A pure vegetarian restaurant, I have been here almost three times and was not at all disappointed. Home style food.
Things worth trying out here are rajma masala, Dal fry, palak paneer, mushroom matter and their soft phulkas.
The Food here is good for your stomach and they avoid too much of oil and spices. Good place to have vegetarian food and their rates are economical too.'), ('Rated 3.5', "RATED

  This place serves food like home...healthy cooking style for the thali..decent hygiene maintained..definitely worth the price and a place where u can go for a regular north indian meal..if you are fond of fresh n soft pulkas served on your plate, then a must visit'), ('Rated 3.5', 'RATED
  This is a place which is not very prominently visible, but frequented by the people who have been staying in and around JP Nagar for some years. The ambience of this "restaurant" is not "restaurantish" :-) It's more like a college canteen, because of the youngsters visiting.

Have been here many times in the past for A-la-carte North Indian food and more recently for just having a Thali. The preparation of the vegetables and Dal was okay and the Phulkas were served hot and fresh. Taste is not very great, but not bad too.

On the price point, it is quite reasonable for the quantity and taste offered. The service was quite quick and the phulkas were served in rounds of 2-2, so that they are freshly served.

Overall, this is an above average restaurant for those who are missing actual North Indian meal (without Tandoori Roti)...

Taste: 3/5
Ambience: 3/5
Service: 4/5'), ('Rated 3.5', 'RATED
  We order from this place whenever we want to have Sarson ka saag & amazing gulab jamuns.

  When you're in no mood to cook and have simple food in mind, look no further. Order atleast twice a week from here and always get what we expect from this place. Never actually been to the place itself so no comments on the ambience. Like their parathas and lassi"), ('Rated 3.5', "RATED
  Value for money is what this place is. Must tries are their dum aloo and palak paneer. Avoid the malai kofta though, Sarson ka saag is pretty decent too. Totally affordable and it seems like a place where bachelors and college students frequent for a homely meal. Don't expect a fine dining experience. It is just a place to go for quick decent reasonably priced food. The ambience is ok, not bad."), ('Rated 4.5', "RATED
  I went DAL ROTI for lunch today, Food Was so tasty It was awesome.
If u like Triditional INDIAN Food and some rajsthani disesh specially Besan Gatta sabji this is one of the best place, I have been at BBQ nation,rajdhani,Gramin and OM's @ kormangal But this place I felt was better than those places by all means including rates."), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  Vry good food...1st time in bangalore enjoyed gatte ki sabji..every dish was awsm..only disadvantage is the looks of the resturant..if u really want to enjoy north indian dishes..in a reasonable price..den this is the place..superlyk..:)'), ('Rated 3.5', 'RATED
  I used to frequent this place when I was staying in 1st Phase JP nagar. The place is popular for its value for money thali which has 4 phulkas, dal, 2 sabzi and some chawla. They also have day specials. Most of the items on the menu are very affordable and tastes great. The Phulkas is soft and nice and I just love the pudina chutney in the thali.

The stuffed parathas are excellent.

The hot and pure ghee gulab gamun is a delicacy and a must try.'), ('Rated 3.5', "RATED
